deskripsi: Surat Al Baqarah yang 286 ayat itu turun di Madinah yang sebahagian besar diturunkan pada permulaan tahun Hijrah, kecuali ayat 281 diturunkan di Mina pada Hajji wadaa' (hajji Nabi Muhammad s.a.w. yang terakhir). Seluruh ayat dari surat Al Baqarah termasuk golongan Madaniyyah, merupakan surat yang terpanjang di antara surat-surat Al Quran yang di dalamnya terdapat pula ayat yang terpancang (ayat 282). Surat ini dinamai Al Baqarah karena di dalamnya disebutkan kisah penyembelihan sapi betina yang diperintahkan Allah kepada Bani Israil (ayat 67 sampai dengan 74), dimana dijelaskan watak orang Yahudi pada umumnya. Dinamai Fusthaatul-Quran (puncak Al Quran) karena memuat beberapa hukum yang tidak disebutkan dalam surat yang lain. Dinamai juga surat alif-laam-miim karena surat ini dimulai dengan Alif-laam-miim.

ayat.teksArab: الۤمّۤ ۚ
ayat.teksLatin: Alif lām mīm.
ayat.teksIndonesia: Alif, Lām, Meem.<sup foot_note=195935>1</sup>
ayat.teksInggris: Alif, Lām, Meem.<sup foot_note=195935>1</sup>

ayat.teksArab: ذٰلِكَ الْكِتٰبُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيْهِ ۛ هُدًى لِّلْمُتَّقِيْنَۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Żālikal-kitābu lā raiba fīh(i), hudal lil-muttaqīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allāh<sup foot_note=195936>1</sup> -
ayat.teksInggris: This is the Book about which there is no doubt, a guidance for those conscious of Allāh<sup foot_note=195936>1</sup> -

ayat.teksArab: الَّذِيْنَ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيْمُوْنَ الصَّلٰوةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنٰهُمْ يُنْفِقُوْنَ ۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Al-lażīna yu'minūna bil-gaibi wa yuqīmūnaṣ-ṣalāta wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer,<sup foot_note=195938>1</sup> and spend out of what We<sup foot_note=195937>2</sup> have provided for them,
ayat.teksInggris: Who believe in the unseen, establish prayer,<sup foot_note=195938>1</sup> and spend out of what We<sup foot_note=195937>2</sup> have provided for them,

ayat.teksArab: وَالَّذِيْنَ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِمَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْكَ وَمَآ اُنْزِلَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ ۚ وَبِالْاٰخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوْقِنُوْنَۗ
ayat.teksLatin: Wal-lażīna yu'minūna bimā unzila ilaika wa mā unzila min qablik(a), wabil-ākhirati hum yūqinūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And who believe in what has been revealed to you, [O Muḥammad], and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].
ayat.teksInggris: And who believe in what has been revealed to you, [O Muḥammad], and what was revealed before you, and of the Hereafter they are certain [in faith].

ayat.teksArab: اُولٰۤىِٕكَ عَلٰى هُدًى مِّنْ رَّبِّهِمْ ۙ وَاُولٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ الْمُفْلِحُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ulā'ika ‘alā hudam mir rabbihim wa ulā'ika humul-mufliḥūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Those are upon [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.
ayat.teksInggris: Those are upon [right] guidance from their Lord, and it is those who are the successful.

ayat.teksArab: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا سَوَاۤءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَاَنْذَرْتَهُمْ اَمْ لَمْ تُنْذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Innal-lażīna kafarū sawā'un ‘alaihim a'anżartahum am lam tunżirhum lā yu'minūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Indeed, those who disbelieve<sup foot_note=195939>1</sup> - it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.
ayat.teksInggris: Indeed, those who disbelieve<sup foot_note=195939>1</sup> - it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe.

ayat.teksArab: خَتَمَ اللّٰهُ عَلٰى قُلُوْبِهِمْ وَعَلٰى سَمْعِهِمْ ۗ وَعَلٰٓى اَبْصَارِهِمْ غِشَاوَةٌ وَّلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيْمٌ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Khatamallāhu ‘alā qulūbihim wa ‘alā sam‘ihim wa ‘alā abṣārihim gisyāwatuw wa lahum ‘ażābun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Allāh has set a seal upon their hearts and upon their hearing, and over their vision is a veil.<sup foot_note=195940>1</sup> And for them is a great punishment.
ayat.teksInggris: Allāh has set a seal upon their hearts and upon their hearing, and over their vision is a veil.<sup foot_note=195940>1</sup> And for them is a great punishment.

ayat.teksArab: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَّقُوْلُ اٰمَنَّا بِاللّٰهِ وَبِالْيَوْمِ الْاٰخِرِ وَمَا هُمْ بِمُؤْمِنِيْنَۘ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa minan-nāsi may yaqūlu āmannā billāhi wa bil-yaumil-ākhiri wa mā hum bimu'minīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allāh and the Last Day," but they are not believers.
ayat.teksInggris: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allāh and the Last Day," but they are not believers.

ayat.teksArab: يُخٰدِعُوْنَ اللّٰهَ وَالَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا ۚ وَمَا يَخْدَعُوْنَ اِلَّآ اَنْفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُوْنَۗ
ayat.teksLatin: Yukhādi‘ūnallāha wal-lażīna āmanū wa mā yakhda‘ūna illā anfusahum wa mā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: They [think to] deceive Allāh and those who believe, but they deceive not except themselves and perceive [it] not.
ayat.teksInggris: They [think to] deceive Allāh and those who believe, but they deceive not except themselves and perceive [it] not.

ayat.teksArab: فِيْ قُلُوْبِهِمْ مَّرَضٌۙ فَزَادَهُمُ اللّٰهُ مَرَضًاۚ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ ۢ ەۙ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَكْذِبُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Fī qulūbihim maraḍun fa zādahumullāhu maraḍā(n), wa lahum ‘ażābun alīmum bimā kānū yakżibūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: In their hearts is disease, so Allāh has increased their disease;<sup foot_note=195941>1</sup> and for them is a painful punishment because they [habitually] used to lie.
ayat.teksInggris: In their hearts is disease, so Allāh has increased their disease;<sup foot_note=195941>1</sup> and for them is a painful punishment because they [habitually] used to lie.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذَا قِيْلَ لَهُمْ لَا تُفْسِدُوْا فِى الْاَرْضِۙ قَالُوْٓا اِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُصْلِحُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iżā qīla lahum lā tufsidū fil-arḍ(i), qālū innamā naḥnu muṣliḥūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And when it is said to them, "Do not cause corruption on the earth," they say, "We are but reformers."
ayat.teksInggris: And when it is said to them, "Do not cause corruption on the earth," they say, "We are but reformers."

ayat.teksArab: اَلَآ اِنَّهُمْ هُمُ الْمُفْسِدُوْنَ وَلٰكِنْ لَّا يَشْعُرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Alā innahum humul-mufsidūna wa lākil lā yasy‘urūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Unquestionably, it is they who are the corrupters, but they perceive [it] not.
ayat.teksInggris: Unquestionably, it is they who are the corrupters, but they perceive [it] not.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذَا قِيْلَ لَهُمْ اٰمِنُوْا كَمَآ اٰمَنَ النَّاسُ قَالُوْٓا اَنُؤْمِنُ كَمَآ اٰمَنَ السُّفَهَاۤءُ ۗ اَلَآ اِنَّهُمْ هُمُ السُّفَهَاۤءُ وَلٰكِنْ لَّا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iżā qīla lahum āminū kamā āmanan nāsu qālū anu'minu kamā āmanas-sufahā'(u), alā innahum humus-sufahā'u wa lākil lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And when it is said to them, "Believe as the people have believed," they say, "Should we believe as the foolish have believed?" Unquestionably, it is they who are the foolish, but they know [it] not.
ayat.teksInggris: And when it is said to them, "Believe as the people have believed," they say, "Should we believe as the foolish have believed?" Unquestionably, it is they who are the foolish, but they know [it] not.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذَا لَقُوا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا قَالُوْٓا اٰمَنَّا ۚ وَاِذَا خَلَوْا اِلٰى شَيٰطِيْنِهِمْ ۙ قَالُوْٓا اِنَّا مَعَكُمْ  ۙاِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُسْتَهْزِءُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iżā laqul-lażīna āmanū qālū āmannā, wa iżā khalau ilā syayāṭīnihim qālū innā ma‘akum, innamā naḥnu mustahzi'ūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And when they meet those who believe, they say, "We believe"; but when they are alone with their evil ones, they say, "Indeed, we are with you; we were only mockers."
ayat.teksInggris: And when they meet those who believe, they say, "We believe"; but when they are alone with their evil ones, they say, "Indeed, we are with you; we were only mockers."

ayat.teksArab: اَللّٰهُ يَسْتَهْزِئُ بِهِمْ وَيَمُدُّهُمْ فِيْ طُغْيَانِهِمْ يَعْمَهُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Allāhu yastahzi'u bihim wa yamudduhum fī ṭugyānihim ya‘mahūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: [But] Allāh mocks them and prolongs them in their transgression [while] they wander blindly.
ayat.teksInggris: [But] Allāh mocks them and prolongs them in their transgression [while] they wander blindly.

ayat.teksArab: اُولٰۤىِٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ اشْتَرَوُا الضَّلٰلَةَ بِالْهُدٰىۖ فَمَا رَبِحَتْ تِّجَارَتُهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوْا مُهْتَدِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ulā'ikal-lażīnasytarawuḍ-ḍalālata bil-hudā, famā rabiḥat tijāratuhum wa mā kānū muhtadīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Those are the ones who have purchased error [in exchange] for guidance, so their transaction has brought no profit, nor were they guided.
ayat.teksInggris: Those are the ones who have purchased error [in exchange] for guidance, so their transaction has brought no profit, nor were they guided.

ayat.teksArab: مَثَلُهُمْ كَمَثَلِ الَّذِى اسْتَوْقَدَ نَارًا ۚ فَلَمَّآ اَضَاۤءَتْ مَا حَوْلَهٗ ذَهَبَ اللّٰهُ بِنُوْرِهِمْ وَتَرَكَهُمْ فِيْ ظُلُمٰتٍ لَّا يُبْصِرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Maṡaluhum kamaṡalil-lażistauqada nārā(n), falammā aḍā'at mā ḥaulahūū  żahaballāhu binūrihim wa tarakahum fī ẓulumātil lā yubṣirūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Their example is that of one who kindled a fire, but when it illuminated what was around him, Allāh took away their light and left them in darkness [so] they could not see.
ayat.teksInggris: Their example is that of one who kindled a fire, but when it illuminated what was around him, Allāh took away their light and left them in darkness [so] they could not see.

ayat.teksArab: صُمٌّ ۢ بُكْمٌ عُمْيٌ فَهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُوْنَۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Ṣummum bukmun ‘umyun fahum lā yarji‘ūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Deaf, dumb and blind - so they will not return [to the right path].
ayat.teksInggris: Deaf, dumb and blind - so they will not return [to the right path].

ayat.teksArab: اَوْ كَصَيِّبٍ مِّنَ السَّمَاۤءِ فِيْهِ ظُلُمٰتٌ وَّرَعْدٌ وَّبَرْقٌۚ يَجْعَلُوْنَ اَصَابِعَهُمْ فِيْٓ اٰذَانِهِمْ مِّنَ الصَّوَاعِقِ حَذَرَ الْمَوْتِۗ وَاللّٰهُ مُحِيْطٌۢ بِالْكٰفِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Au kaṣayyibim minas-samā'i fīhi ẓulumātuw wa ra‘duw wa barq(un), yaj‘alūna aṣābi‘ahum fī āżānihim minaṣ-ṣawā‘iqi ḥażaral-maut(i), wallāhu muḥīṭum bil- kāfirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Or [it is] like a rainstorm from the sky within which is darkness, thunder and lightning. They put their fingers in their ears against the thunderclaps in dread of death. But Allāh is encompassing<sup foot_note=195942>1</sup> of the disbelievers.
ayat.teksInggris: Or [it is] like a rainstorm from the sky within which is darkness, thunder and lightning. They put their fingers in their ears against the thunderclaps in dread of death. But Allāh is encompassing<sup foot_note=195942>1</sup> of the disbelievers.

ayat.teksArab: يَكَادُ الْبَرْقُ يَخْطَفُ اَبْصَارَهُمْ ۗ كُلَّمَآ اَضَاۤءَ لَهُمْ مَّشَوْا فِيْهِ ۙ وَاِذَآ اَظْلَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ قَامُوْا ۗوَلَوْ شَاۤءَ اللّٰهُ لَذَهَبَ بِسَمْعِهِمْ وَاَبْصَارِهِمْ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Yakādul-barqu yakhṭafu abṣārahum, kullamā aḍā'a lahum masyau fīh(i), wa iżā aẓlama ‘alaihim qāmū, wa lau syā'allāhu lażahaba bisam‘ihim wa abṣārihim, innallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: The lightning almost snatches away their sight. Every time it lights [the way] for them, they walk therein; but when darkness comes over them, they stand [still]. And if Allāh had willed, He could have taken away their hearing and their sight. Indeed, Allāh is over all things competent.
ayat.teksInggris: The lightning almost snatches away their sight. Every time it lights [the way] for them, they walk therein; but when darkness comes over them, they stand [still]. And if Allāh had willed, He could have taken away their hearing and their sight. Indeed, Allāh is over all things competent.

ayat.teksArab: يٰٓاَيُّهَا النَّاسُ اعْبُدُوْا رَبَّكُمُ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَكُمْ وَالَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُوْنَۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā ayyuhan-nāsu‘budū rabbakumul-lażī khalaqakum wal-lażīna min qablikum la‘allakum tattaqūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O mankind, worship your Lord, who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous -
ayat.teksInggris: O mankind, worship your Lord, who created you and those before you, that you may become righteous -

ayat.teksArab: الَّذِيْ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْاَرْضَ فِرَاشًا وَّالسَّمَاۤءَ بِنَاۤءً  ۖوَّاَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاۤءِ مَاۤءً فَاَخْرَجَ بِهٖ مِنَ الثَّمَرٰتِ رِزْقًا لَّكُمْ ۚ فَلَا تَجْعَلُوْا لِلّٰهِ اَنْدَادًا وَّاَنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Allażī ja‘ala lakumul-arḍa firāsyaw was-samā'a binā'ā(n), wa anzala minas-samā'i mā'an fa akhraja bihī minaṡ-ṡamarāti rizqal lakum, falā taj‘alū lillāhi andādaw wa antum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: [He] who made for you the earth a bed [spread out] and the sky a ceiling and sent down from the sky, rain and brought forth thereby fruits as provision for you. So do not attribute to Allāh equals while you know [that there is nothing similar to Him].
ayat.teksInggris: [He] who made for you the earth a bed [spread out] and the sky a ceiling and sent down from the sky, rain and brought forth thereby fruits as provision for you. So do not attribute to Allāh equals while you know [that there is nothing similar to Him].

ayat.teksArab: وَاِنْ كُنْتُمْ فِيْ رَيْبٍ مِّمَّا نَزَّلْنَا عَلٰى عَبْدِنَا فَأْتُوْا بِسُوْرَةٍ مِّنْ مِّثْلِهٖ ۖ وَادْعُوْا شُهَدَاۤءَكُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ صٰدِقِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa in kuntum fī raibim mimmā nazzalnā ‘alā ‘abdinā fa'tū bisūratim mim miṡlih(ī), wad‘ū syuhadā'akum min dūnillāhi in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And if you are in doubt about what We have sent down [i.e., the Qur’ān] upon Our Servant [i.e., Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ)], then produce a sūrah the like thereof and call upon your witnesses [i.e., supporters] other than Allāh, if you should be truthful.
ayat.teksInggris: And if you are in doubt about what We have sent down [i.e., the Qur’ān] upon Our Servant [i.e., Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ)], then produce a sūrah the like thereof and call upon your witnesses [i.e., supporters] other than Allāh, if you should be truthful.

ayat.teksArab: فَاِنْ لَّمْ تَفْعَلُوْا وَلَنْ تَفْعَلُوْا فَاتَّقُوا النَّارَ الَّتِيْ وَقُوْدُهَا النَّاسُ وَالْحِجَارَةُ ۖ اُعِدَّتْ لِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Fa'illam taf‘alū wa lan taf‘alū fattaqun-nāral-latī waqūduhan-nāsu wal-ḥijārah(tu), u‘iddat lil-kāfirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: But if you do not - and you will never be able to - then fear the Fire, whose fuel is people and stones, prepared for the disbelievers.
ayat.teksInggris: But if you do not - and you will never be able to - then fear the Fire, whose fuel is people and stones, prepared for the disbelievers.

ayat.teksArab: وَبَشِّرِ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ اَنَّ لَهُمْ جَنّٰتٍ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ ۗ كُلَّمَا رُزِقُوْا مِنْهَا مِنْ ثَمَرَةٍ رِّزْقًا ۙ قَالُوْا هٰذَا الَّذِيْ رُزِقْنَا مِنْ قَبْلُ  وَاُتُوْا بِهٖ مُتَشَابِهًا ۗوَلَهُمْ فِيْهَآ اَزْوَاجٌ مُّطَهَّرَةٌ  وَّهُمْ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa basysyiril-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti anna lahum jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal- anhār(u), kullamā ruziqū minhā min ṡamaratir rizqā(n), qālū hāżal-lażī ruziqnā min qablu wa utū bihī mutasyābihā(n), wa lahum fīhā azwājum muṭahharatuw wa hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And give good tidings to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens [in Paradise] beneath which rivers flow. Whenever they are provided with a provision of fruit therefrom, they will say, "This is what we were provided with before." And it is given to them in likeness. And they will have therein purified spouses, and they will abide therein eternally.
ayat.teksInggris: And give good tidings to those who believe and do righteous deeds that they will have gardens [in Paradise] beneath which rivers flow. Whenever they are provided with a provision of fruit therefrom, they will say, "This is what we were provided with before." And it is given to them in likeness. And they will have therein purified spouses, and they will abide therein eternally.

ayat.teksArab: ۞ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يَسْتَحْيٖٓ اَنْ يَّضْرِبَ مَثَلًا مَّا بَعُوْضَةً فَمَا فَوْقَهَا ۗ فَاَمَّا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا فَيَعْلَمُوْنَ اَنَّهُ الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَّبِّهِمْ ۚ وَاَمَّا الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا فَيَقُوْلُوْنَ مَاذَآ اَرَادَ اللّٰهُ بِهٰذَا مَثَلًا ۘ يُضِلُّ بِهٖ كَثِيْرًا وَّيَهْدِيْ بِهٖ كَثِيْرًا ۗ وَمَا يُضِلُّ بِهٖٓ اِلَّا الْفٰسِقِيْنَۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Innallāha lā yastaḥyī ay yaḍriba maṡalam mā ba‘ūḍatan famā fauqahā, fa'ammal- lażīna āmanū faya‘lamūna annahul-ḥaqqu mir rabbihim, wa ammal-lażīna kafarū fayaqūlūna māżā arādallāhu bihāżā maṡalā(n), yuḍillu bihī kaṡīraw wa yahdī bihī kaṡīrā(n), wa mā yuḍillu bihī illal-fāsiqīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Indeed, Allāh is not timid to present an example - that of a mosquito or what is smaller<sup foot_note=195943>1</sup> than it. And those who have believed know that it is the truth from their Lord. But as for those who disbelieve, they say, "What did Allāh intend by this as an example?" He misleads many thereby and guides many thereby. And He misleads not except the defiantly disobedient,
ayat.teksInggris: Indeed, Allāh is not timid to present an example - that of a mosquito or what is smaller<sup foot_note=195943>1</sup> than it. And those who have believed know that it is the truth from their Lord. But as for those who disbelieve, they say, "What did Allāh intend by this as an example?" He misleads many thereby and guides many thereby. And He misleads not except the defiantly disobedient,

ayat.teksArab: الَّذِيْنَ يَنْقُضُوْنَ عَهْدَ اللّٰهِ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مِيْثَاقِهٖۖ وَيَقْطَعُوْنَ مَآ اَمَرَ اللّٰهُ بِهٖٓ اَنْ يُّوْصَلَ وَيُفْسِدُوْنَ فِى الْاَرْضِۗ  اُولٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ الْخٰسِرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Allażīna yanquḍūna ‘ahdallāhi mim ba‘di mīṡāqih(ī), wa yaqṭa‘ūna mā amarallāhu bihī ay yūṣala wa yufsidūna fil-arḍ(i), ulā'ika humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Who break the covenant of Allāh after contracting it and sever that which Allāh has ordered to be joined and cause corruption on earth. It is those who are the losers.
ayat.teksInggris: Who break the covenant of Allāh after contracting it and sever that which Allāh has ordered to be joined and cause corruption on earth. It is those who are the losers.

ayat.teksArab: كَيْفَ تَكْفُرُوْنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَكُنْتُمْ اَمْوَاتًا فَاَحْيَاكُمْۚ  ثُمَّ يُمِيْتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيْكُمْ ثُمَّ اِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Kaifa takfurūna billāhi wa kuntum amwātan fa'aḥyākum, ṡumma yumītukum ṡumma yuḥyīkum ṡumma ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: How can you disbelieve in Allāh when you were lifeless and He brought you to life; then He will cause you to die, then He will bring you [back] to life, and then to Him you will be returned.
ayat.teksInggris: How can you disbelieve in Allāh when you were lifeless and He brought you to life; then He will cause you to die, then He will bring you [back] to life, and then to Him you will be returned.

ayat.teksArab: هُوَ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَ لَكُمْ مَّا فِى الْاَرْضِ جَمِيْعًا ثُمَّ اسْتَوٰٓى اِلَى السَّمَاۤءِ فَسَوّٰىهُنَّ سَبْعَ سَمٰوٰتٍ ۗ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيْءٍ عَلِيْمٌ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Huwal-lażī khalaqa lakum mā fil-arḍi jamī‘ā(n), ṡummastawā ilas-samā'i fasawwāhunna sab‘a samāwāt(in), wa huwa bikulli syai'in ‘alīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: It is He who created for you all of that which is on the earth. Then He directed Himself<sup foot_note=195944>1</sup> to the heaven, [His being above all creation], and made them seven heavens, and He is Knowing of all things.
ayat.teksInggris: It is He who created for you all of that which is on the earth. Then He directed Himself<sup foot_note=195944>1</sup> to the heaven, [His being above all creation], and made them seven heavens, and He is Knowing of all things.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةِ اِنِّيْ جَاعِلٌ فِى الْاَرْضِ خَلِيْفَةً ۗ قَالُوْٓا اَتَجْعَلُ فِيْهَا مَنْ يُّفْسِدُ فِيْهَا وَيَسْفِكُ الدِّمَاۤءَۚ وَنَحْنُ نُسَبِّحُ بِحَمْدِكَ وَنُقَدِّسُ لَكَ ۗ قَالَ اِنِّيْٓ اَعْلَمُ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż qāla rabbuka lil-malā'ikati innī jā‘ilun fil-arḍi khalīfah(tan), qālū ataj‘alu fīhā may yufsidu fīhā wa yasfikud-dimā'(a), wa naḥnu nusabbiḥu biḥamdika wa nuqaddisu lak(a), qāla innī a‘lamu mā lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [mention, O Muḥammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I will make upon the earth a successive authority."<sup foot_note=195946>1</sup> They said, "Will You place upon it one who causes corruption therein and sheds blood, while we exalt You with praise and declare Your perfection?"<sup foot_note=195945>2</sup> He [Allāh] said, "Indeed, I know that which you do not know."
ayat.teksInggris: And [mention, O Muḥammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I will make upon the earth a successive authority."<sup foot_note=195946>1</sup> They said, "Will You place upon it one who causes corruption therein and sheds blood, while we exalt You with praise and declare Your perfection?"<sup foot_note=195945>2</sup> He [Allāh] said, "Indeed, I know that which you do not know."

ayat.teksArab: وَعَلَّمَ اٰدَمَ الْاَسْمَاۤءَ كُلَّهَا ثُمَّ عَرَضَهُمْ عَلَى الْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةِ فَقَالَ اَنْۢبِـُٔوْنِيْ بِاَسْمَاۤءِ هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ صٰدِقِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa ‘allama ādamal-asmā'a kullahā ṡumma ‘araḍahum ‘alal-malā'ikati faqāla ambi'ūnī bi'asmā'i hā'ulā'i in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And He taught Adam the names - all of them. Then He showed them to the angels and said, "Inform Me of the names of these, if you are truthful."
ayat.teksInggris: And He taught Adam the names - all of them. Then He showed them to the angels and said, "Inform Me of the names of these, if you are truthful."

ayat.teksArab: قَالُوْا سُبْحٰنَكَ لَا عِلْمَ لَنَآ اِلَّا مَا عَلَّمْتَنَا ۗاِنَّكَ اَنْتَ الْعَلِيْمُ الْحَكِيْمُ
ayat.teksLatin: Qālū subḥānaka lā ‘ilma lanā illā mā ‘allamtanā, innaka antal-‘alīmul-ḥakīm(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: They said, "Exalted are You; we have no knowledge except what You have taught us. Indeed, it is You who is the Knowing,<sup foot_note=195948>1</sup> the Wise."<sup foot_note=195947>2</sup>
ayat.teksInggris: They said, "Exalted are You; we have no knowledge except what You have taught us. Indeed, it is You who is the Knowing,<sup foot_note=195948>1</sup> the Wise."<sup foot_note=195947>2</sup>

ayat.teksArab: قَالَ يٰٓاٰدَمُ اَنْۢبِئْهُمْ بِاَسْمَاۤىِٕهِمْ ۚ فَلَمَّآ اَنْۢبَاَهُمْ بِاَسْمَاۤىِٕهِمْۙ قَالَ اَلَمْ اَقُلْ لَّكُمْ اِنِّيْٓ اَعْلَمُ غَيْبَ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِۙ وَاَعْلَمُ مَا تُبْدُوْنَ وَمَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْتُمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Qāla yā ādamu ambi'hum bi'asmā'ihim, falammā amba'ahum bi'asmā'ihim, qāla alam aqul lakum innī a‘lamu gaibas-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa a‘lamu mā tubdūna wa mā kuntum taktumūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: He said, "O Adam, inform them of their names." And when he had informed them of their names, He said, "Did I not tell you that I know the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth? And I know what you reveal and what you have concealed."
ayat.teksInggris: He said, "O Adam, inform them of their names." And when he had informed them of their names, He said, "Did I not tell you that I know the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth? And I know what you reveal and what you have concealed."

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةِ اسْجُدُوْا لِاٰدَمَ فَسَجَدُوْٓا اِلَّآ اِبْلِيْسَۗ  اَبٰى وَاسْتَكْبَرَۖ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż qulnā lil-malā'ikatisjudū li ādama fasajadū illā iblīs(a), abā wastakbara wa kāna minal-kāfirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate before Adam"; so they prostrated, except for Iblees.<sup foot_note=195949>1</sup> He refused and was arrogant and became of the disbelievers.
ayat.teksInggris: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate before Adam"; so they prostrated, except for Iblees.<sup foot_note=195949>1</sup> He refused and was arrogant and became of the disbelievers.

ayat.teksArab: وَقُلْنَا يٰٓاٰدَمُ اسْكُنْ اَنْتَ وَزَوْجُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَكُلَا مِنْهَا رَغَدًا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمَاۖ وَلَا تَقْرَبَا هٰذِهِ الشَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُوْنَا مِنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qulnā yā ādamuskun anta wa zaujukal-jannata wa kulā minhā ragadan ḥaiṡu syi'tumā,  wa lā taqrabā hāżihisy-syajarata fa takūnā minaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And We said, "O Adam, dwell, you and your wife, in Paradise and eat therefrom in [ease and] abundance from wherever you will. But do not approach this tree, lest you be among the wrongdoers."
ayat.teksInggris: And We said, "O Adam, dwell, you and your wife, in Paradise and eat therefrom in [ease and] abundance from wherever you will. But do not approach this tree, lest you be among the wrongdoers."

ayat.teksArab: فَاَزَلَّهُمَا الشَّيْطٰنُ عَنْهَا فَاَخْرَجَهُمَا مِمَّا كَانَا فِيْهِ ۖ وَقُلْنَا اهْبِطُوْا بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ ۚ وَلَكُمْ فِى الْاَرْضِ مُسْتَقَرٌّ وَّمَتَاعٌ اِلٰى حِيْنٍ
ayat.teksLatin: Fa'azallahumasy-syaiṭānu ‘anhā fa akhrajahumā mimmā kānā fīh(i), wa qulnahbiṭū ba‘ḍukum liba‘ḍin ‘aduww(un), wa lakum fil-arḍi mustaqarruw wa matā‘un ilā ḥīn(in).
ayat.teksIndonesia: But Satan caused them to slip out of it and removed them from that [condition] in which they had been. And We said, "Go down, [all of you], as enemies to one another, and you will have upon the earth a place of settlement and provision for a time."
ayat.teksInggris: But Satan caused them to slip out of it and removed them from that [condition] in which they had been. And We said, "Go down, [all of you], as enemies to one another, and you will have upon the earth a place of settlement and provision for a time."

ayat.teksArab: فَتَلَقّٰٓى اٰدَمُ مِنْ رَّبِّهٖ كَلِمٰتٍ فَتَابَ عَلَيْهِ ۗ اِنَّهٗ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيْمُ
ayat.teksLatin: Fatalaqqā ādamu mir rabbihī kalimātin fatāba ‘alaih(i), innahū huwat-tawwābur- raḥīm(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Then Adam received from his Lord [some] words,<sup foot_note=195951>1</sup> and He accepted his repentance. Indeed, it is He who is the Accepting of Repentance,<sup foot_note=195950>2</sup> the Merciful.
ayat.teksInggris: Then Adam received from his Lord [some] words,<sup foot_note=195951>1</sup> and He accepted his repentance. Indeed, it is He who is the Accepting of Repentance,<sup foot_note=195950>2</sup> the Merciful.

ayat.teksArab: قُلْنَا اهْبِطُوْا مِنْهَا جَمِيْعًا ۚ فَاِمَّا يَأْتِيَنَّكُمْ مِّنِّيْ هُدًى فَمَنْ تَبِعَ هُدَايَ فَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Qulnahbiṭū minhā jamī‘ā(n), fa'immā ya'tiyannakum minnī hudan faman tabi‘a hudāya falā khaufun ‘alaihim wa lā hum yaḥzanūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: We said, "Go down from it, all of you. And when guidance comes to you from Me, whoever follows My guidance - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.
ayat.teksInggris: We said, "Go down from it, all of you. And when guidance comes to you from Me, whoever follows My guidance - there will be no fear concerning them, nor will they grieve.

ayat.teksArab: وَالَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا وَكَذَّبُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَآ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ النَّارِ ۚ هُمْ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Wal-lażīna kafarū wa każżabū bi'āyātinā ulā'ika aṣḥābun-nār(i), hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And those who disbelieve and deny Our signs - those will be companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally."
ayat.teksInggris: And those who disbelieve and deny Our signs - those will be companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally."

ayat.teksArab: يٰبَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ اذْكُرُوْا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِيْٓ اَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَاَوْفُوْا بِعَهْدِيْٓ اُوْفِ بِعَهْدِكُمْۚ وَاِيَّايَ فَارْهَبُوْنِ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā banī isrā'īlażkurū ni‘matiyal-latī an‘amtu ‘alaikum wa aufū bi‘ahdī ūfi bi‘ahdikum, wa iyyāya farhabūn(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O Children of Israel, remember My favor which I have bestowed upon you and fulfill My covenant [upon you] that I will fulfill your covenant [from Me], and be afraid of [only] Me.
ayat.teksInggris: O Children of Israel, remember My favor which I have bestowed upon you and fulfill My covenant [upon you] that I will fulfill your covenant [from Me], and be afraid of [only] Me.

ayat.teksArab: وَاٰمِنُوْا بِمَآ اَنْزَلْتُ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا مَعَكُمْ وَلَا تَكُوْنُوْٓا اَوَّلَ كَافِرٍۢ بِهٖ ۖ وَلَا تَشْتَرُوْا بِاٰيٰتِيْ ثَمَنًا قَلِيْلًا  ۖوَّاِيَّايَ فَاتَّقُوْنِ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa āminū bimā anzaltu muṣaddiqal limā ma‘akum wa lā takūnū awwala kāfirim bih(ī), wa lā tasytarū bi'āyātī ṡamanan qalīlā(n), wa iyyāya fattaqūn(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And believe in what I have sent down confirming that which is [already] with you, and be not the first to disbelieve in it. And do not exchange My signs for a small price, and fear [only] Me.
ayat.teksInggris: And believe in what I have sent down confirming that which is [already] with you, and be not the first to disbelieve in it. And do not exchange My signs for a small price, and fear [only] Me.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَا تَلْبِسُوا الْحَقَّ بِالْبَاطِلِ وَتَكْتُمُوا الْحَقَّ وَاَنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lā talbisul-ḥaqqa bil-bāṭili wa taktumul-ḥaqqa wa antum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And do not mix the truth with falsehood or conceal the truth while you know [it].
ayat.teksInggris: And do not mix the truth with falsehood or conceal the truth while you know [it].

ayat.teksArab: وَاَقِيْمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَاٰتُوا الزَّكٰوةَ وَارْكَعُوْا مَعَ الرّٰكِعِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa aqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātuz-zakāta warka‘ū ma‘ar-rāki‘īn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And establish prayer and give zakāh<sup foot_note=195952>1</sup> and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience].
ayat.teksInggris: And establish prayer and give zakāh<sup foot_note=195952>1</sup> and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience].

ayat.teksArab: ۞ اَتَأْمُرُوْنَ النَّاسَ بِالْبِرِّ وَتَنْسَوْنَ اَنْفُسَكُمْ وَاَنْتُمْ تَتْلُوْنَ الْكِتٰبَ ۗ اَفَلَا تَعْقِلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ata'murūnan-nāsa bil-birri wa tansauna anfusakum wa antum tatlūnal-kitāb(a), afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Do you order righteousness of the people and forget<sup foot_note=195953>1</sup> yourselves while you recite the Scripture? Then will you not reason?
ayat.teksInggris: Do you order righteousness of the people and forget<sup foot_note=195953>1</sup> yourselves while you recite the Scripture? Then will you not reason?

ayat.teksArab: وَاسْتَعِيْنُوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلٰوةِ ۗ وَاِنَّهَا لَكَبِيْرَةٌ اِلَّا عَلَى الْخٰشِعِيْنَۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Wasta‘īnū biṣ-ṣabri waṣ-ṣalāh(ti), wa innahā lakabīratun illā ‘alal-khāsyi‘īn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And seek help through patience and prayer; and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive [to Allāh]
ayat.teksInggris: And seek help through patience and prayer; and indeed, it is difficult except for the humbly submissive [to Allāh]

ayat.teksArab: الَّذِيْنَ يَظُنُّوْنَ اَنَّهُمْ مُّلٰقُوْا رَبِّهِمْ وَاَنَّهُمْ اِلَيْهِ رٰجِعُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Allażīna yaẓunnūna annahum mulāqū rabbihim wa annahum ilaihi rāji‘ūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Who are certain that they will meet their Lord and that they will return to Him.
ayat.teksInggris: Who are certain that they will meet their Lord and that they will return to Him.

ayat.teksArab: يٰبَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ اذْكُرُوْا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِيْٓ اَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَاَنِّيْ فَضَّلْتُكُمْ عَلَى الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā banī isrā'īlażkurū ni‘matiyal-latī an‘amtu ‘alaikum wa annī faḍḍaltukum ‘alal- ‘ālamīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O Children of Israel, remember My favor that I have bestowed upon you and that I preferred you over the worlds [i.e., peoples].
ayat.teksInggris: O Children of Israel, remember My favor that I have bestowed upon you and that I preferred you over the worlds [i.e., peoples].

ayat.teksArab: وَاتَّقُوْا يَوْمًا لَّا تَجْزِيْ نَفْسٌ عَنْ نَّفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا وَّلَا يُقْبَلُ مِنْهَا شَفَاعَةٌ وَّلَا يُؤْخَذُ مِنْهَا عَدْلٌ وَّلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wattaqū yaumal lā tajzī nafsun ‘an nafsin syai'aw wa lā yuqbalu minhā syafā‘atuw wa lā yu'khażu minhā ‘adluw wa lā hum yunṣarūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And fear a Day when no soul will suffice for another soul<sup foot_note=195954>1</sup> at all, nor will intercession be accepted from it, nor will compensation be taken from it, nor will they be aided.
ayat.teksInggris: And fear a Day when no soul will suffice for another soul<sup foot_note=195954>1</sup> at all, nor will intercession be accepted from it, nor will compensation be taken from it, nor will they be aided.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ نَجَّيْنٰكُمْ مِّنْ اٰلِ فِرْعَوْنَ يَسُوْمُوْنَكُمْ سُوْۤءَ الْعَذَابِ يُذَبِّحُوْنَ اَبْنَاۤءَكُمْ وَيَسْتَحْيُوْنَ نِسَاۤءَكُمْ ۗ وَفِيْ ذٰلِكُمْ بَلَاۤءٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّكُمْ عَظِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż najjainākum min āli fir‘auna yasūmūnakum sū'al-‘ażābi yużabbiḥūna abnā'akum wa yastaḥyūna nisā'akum, wa fī żālikum balā'um mir rabbikum ‘aẓīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when We saved you [i.e., your forefathers] from the people of Pharaoh, who afflicted you with the worst torment, slaughtering your [newborn] sons and keeping your females alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when We saved you [i.e., your forefathers] from the people of Pharaoh, who afflicted you with the worst torment, slaughtering your [newborn] sons and keeping your females alive. And in that was a great trial from your Lord.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ فَرَقْنَا بِكُمُ الْبَحْرَ فَاَنْجَيْنٰكُمْ وَاَغْرَقْنَآ اٰلَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَاَنْتُمْ تَنْظُرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż faraqnā bikumul-baḥra fa'anjainākum wa agraqnā āla fir‘auna wa antum tanẓurūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when We parted the sea for you and saved you and drowned the people of Pharaoh while you were looking on.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when We parted the sea for you and saved you and drowned the people of Pharaoh while you were looking on.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ وٰعَدْنَا مُوْسٰىٓ اَرْبَعِيْنَ لَيْلَةً ثُمَّ اتَّخَذْتُمُ الْعِجْلَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِهٖ وَاَنْتُمْ ظٰلِمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż wā‘adnā mūsā arba‘īna lailatan ṡummattakhażtumul-‘ijla mim ba‘dihī wa antum ẓālimūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when We made an appointment with Moses for forty nights. Then you took [for worship] the calf after him [i.e., his departure], while you were wrongdoers.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when We made an appointment with Moses for forty nights. Then you took [for worship] the calf after him [i.e., his departure], while you were wrongdoers.

ayat.teksArab: ثُمَّ عَفَوْنَا عَنْكُمْ مِّنْۢ بَعْدِ ذٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ṡumma ‘afaunā ‘ankum mim ba‘di żālika la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Then We forgave you after that so perhaps you would be grateful.
ayat.teksInggris: Then We forgave you after that so perhaps you would be grateful.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ اٰتَيْنَا مُوْسَى الْكِتٰبَ وَالْفُرْقَانَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż ātainā mūsal-kitāba wal-furqāna la‘allakum tahtadūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when We gave Moses the Scripture and criterion<sup foot_note=195955>1</sup> that perhaps you would be guided.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when We gave Moses the Scripture and criterion<sup foot_note=195955>1</sup> that perhaps you would be guided.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ قَالَ مُوْسٰى لِقَوْمِهٖ يٰقَوْمِ اِنَّكُمْ ظَلَمْتُمْ اَنْفُسَكُمْ بِاتِّخَاذِكُمُ الْعِجْلَ فَتُوْبُوْٓا اِلٰى بَارِىِٕكُمْ فَاقْتُلُوْٓا اَنْفُسَكُمْۗ ذٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ عِنْدَ بَارِىِٕكُمْۗ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۗ اِنَّهٗ هُوَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيْمُ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż qāla mūsā liqaumihī yā qaumi innakum ẓalamtum anfusakum bittikhāżikumul- ‘ijla fatūbū ilā bāri'ikum faqtulū anfusakum, żālikum khairul lakum ‘inda bāri'ikum, fatāba ‘alaikum, innahū huwat-tawwābur-raḥīm(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when Moses said to his people, "O my people, indeed you have wronged yourselves by your taking of the calf [for worship]. So repent to your Creator and kill yourselves [i.e., the guilty among you]. That is best for [all of] you in the sight of your Creator." Then He accepted your repentance; indeed, He is the Accepting of Repentance, the Merciful.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when Moses said to his people, "O my people, indeed you have wronged yourselves by your taking of the calf [for worship]. So repent to your Creator and kill yourselves [i.e., the guilty among you]. That is best for [all of] you in the sight of your Creator." Then He accepted your repentance; indeed, He is the Accepting of Repentance, the Merciful.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ قُلْتُمْ يٰمُوْسٰى لَنْ نُّؤْمِنَ لَكَ حَتّٰى نَرَى اللّٰهَ جَهْرَةً فَاَخَذَتْكُمُ الصّٰعِقَةُ وَاَنْتُمْ تَنْظُرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż qultum yā mūsā lan nu'mina laka ḥattā narallāha jahratan fa'akhażatkumuṣ-ṣā‘iqatu wa antum tanẓurūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when you said, "O Moses, we will never believe you until we see Allāh outright"; so the thunderbolt took you while you were looking on.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when you said, "O Moses, we will never believe you until we see Allāh outright"; so the thunderbolt took you while you were looking on.

ayat.teksArab: ثُمَّ بَعَثْنٰكُمْ مِّنْۢ بَعْدِ مَوْتِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ṡumma ba‘aṡnākum mim ba‘di mautikum la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Then We revived you after your death that perhaps you would be grateful.
ayat.teksInggris: Then We revived you after your death that perhaps you would be grateful.

ayat.teksArab: وَظَلَّلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ الْغَمَامَ وَاَنْزَلْنَا عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَنَّ وَالسَّلْوٰى ۗ كُلُوْا مِنْ طَيِّبٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنٰكُمْ ۗ وَمَا ظَلَمُوْنَا وَلٰكِنْ كَانُوْٓا اَنْفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa ẓallalnā ‘alaikumul-gamāma wa anzalnā ‘alaikumul-manna was-salwā, kulū min ṭayyibāti mā razaqnākum, wa mā ẓalamūnā wa lākin kānū anfusahum yaẓlimūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And We shaded you with clouds and sent down to you manna and quails, [saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you." And they wronged Us not - but they were [only] wronging themselves.
ayat.teksInggris: And We shaded you with clouds and sent down to you manna and quails, [saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you." And they wronged Us not - but they were [only] wronging themselves.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ قُلْنَا ادْخُلُوْا هٰذِهِ الْقَرْيَةَ فَكُلُوْا مِنْهَا حَيْثُ شِئْتُمْ رَغَدًا وَّادْخُلُوا الْبَابَ سُجَّدًا وَّقُوْلُوْا حِطَّةٌ نَّغْفِرْ لَكُمْ خَطٰيٰكُمْ ۗ وَسَنَزِيْدُ الْمُحْسِنِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż qulnadkhulū hāżihil-qaryata fakulū minhā ḥaiṡu syi'tum ragadaw wadkhulul- bāba sujjadaw wa qūlū ḥiṭṭatun nagfir lakum khaṭāyākum, wa sanazīdul-muḥsinīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when We said, "Enter this city [i.e., Jerusalem] and eat from it wherever you will in [ease and] abundance, and enter the gate bowing humbly<sup foot_note=195956>1</sup> and say, 'Relieve us of our burdens [i.e., sins].' We will [then] forgive your sins for you, and We will increase the doers of good [in goodness and reward]."
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when We said, "Enter this city [i.e., Jerusalem] and eat from it wherever you will in [ease and] abundance, and enter the gate bowing humbly<sup foot_note=195956>1</sup> and say, 'Relieve us of our burdens [i.e., sins].' We will [then] forgive your sins for you, and We will increase the doers of good [in goodness and reward]."

ayat.teksArab: فَبَدَّلَ الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا قَوْلًا غَيْرَ الَّذِيْ قِيْلَ لَهُمْ فَاَنْزَلْنَا عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا رِجْزًا مِّنَ السَّمَاۤءِ بِمَا كَانُوْا يَفْسُقُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Fabaddalal-lażīna ẓalamū qaulan gairal-lażī qīla lahum fa anzalnā ‘alal-lażīna ẓalamū rijzam minas-samā'i bimā kānū yafsuqūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: But those who wronged changed [those words] to a statement other than that which had been said to them, so We sent down upon those who wronged a punishment [i.e., plague] from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.
ayat.teksInggris: But those who wronged changed [those words] to a statement other than that which had been said to them, so We sent down upon those who wronged a punishment [i.e., plague] from the sky because they were defiantly disobeying.

ayat.teksArab: ۞ وَاِذِ اسْتَسْقٰى مُوْسٰى لِقَوْمِهٖ فَقُلْنَا اضْرِبْ بِّعَصَاكَ الْحَجَرَۗ  فَانْفَجَرَتْ مِنْهُ اثْنَتَا عَشْرَةَ عَيْنًا ۗ قَدْ عَلِمَ كُلُّ اُنَاسٍ مَّشْرَبَهُمْ ۗ كُلُوْا وَاشْرَبُوْا مِنْ رِّزْقِ اللّٰهِ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا فِى الْاَرْضِ مُفْسِدِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iżistasqā mūsā liqaumihī faqulnaḍrib bi‘aṣākal-ḥajar(a), fanfajarat minhuṡnatā ‘asyrata ‘ainā(n), qad ‘alima kullu unāsim masyrabahum, kulū wasyrabū mir rizqillāhi wa lā ta‘ṡau fil-arḍi mufsidīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when Moses prayed for water for his people, so We said, "Strike with your staff the stone." And there gushed forth from it twelve springs, and every people [i.e., tribe] knew its watering place. "Eat and drink from the provision of Allāh, and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption."
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when Moses prayed for water for his people, so We said, "Strike with your staff the stone." And there gushed forth from it twelve springs, and every people [i.e., tribe] knew its watering place. "Eat and drink from the provision of Allāh, and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption."

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ قُلْتُمْ يٰمُوْسٰى لَنْ نَّصْبِرَ عَلٰى طَعَامٍ وَّاحِدٍ فَادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُخْرِجْ لَنَا مِمَّا تُنْۢبِتُ الْاَرْضُ مِنْۢ بَقْلِهَا وَقِثَّاۤىِٕهَا وَفُوْمِهَا وَعَدَسِهَا وَبَصَلِهَا ۗ قَالَ اَتَسْتَبْدِلُوْنَ الَّذِيْ هُوَ اَدْنٰى بِالَّذِيْ هُوَ خَيْرٌ ۗ اِهْبِطُوْا مِصْرًا فَاِنَّ لَكُمْ مَّا سَاَلْتُمْ ۗ وَضُرِبَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ الذِّلَّةُ وَالْمَسْكَنَةُ وَبَاۤءُوْ بِغَضَبٍ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ ۗ ذٰلِكَ بِاَنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا يَكْفُرُوْنَ بِاٰيٰتِ اللّٰهِ وَيَقْتُلُوْنَ النَّبِيّٖنَ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ ۗ ذٰلِكَ بِمَا عَصَوْا وَّكَانُوْا يَعْتَدُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż qultum yā mūsā lan naṣbira ‘alā ṭa‘āmiw wāḥidin fad‘u lanā rabbaka yukhrij lanā mimmā tumbitul-arḍu mim baqlihā wa qiṡṡā'ihā wa fūmihā wa ‘adasihā wa baṣalihā, qāla atastabdilūnal-lażī huwa adnā bil-lażī huwa khair(un), ihbiṭū miṣran fa inna lakum mā sa'altum, wa ḍuribat ‘alaihimuż-żillatu wal-maskanatu wa bā'ū bigaḍabim minallāh(i), żālika bi'annahum kānū yakfurūna bi'āyātillāhi wa yaqtulūnan- nabiyyīna bi gairil-ḥaqq(i), żālika bimā ‘aṣaw wa kānū ya‘tadūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when you said, "O Moses, we can never endure one [kind of] food. So call upon your Lord to bring forth for us from the earth its green herbs and its cucumbers and its garlic and its lentils and its onions." [Moses] said, "Would you exchange what is better for what is less? Go into [any] settlement and indeed, you will have what you have asked." And they were covered with humiliation and poverty and returned with anger from Allāh [upon them]. That was because they [repeatedly] disbelieved in the signs of Allāh and killed the prophets without right. That was because they disobeyed and were [habitually] transgressing.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when you said, "O Moses, we can never endure one [kind of] food. So call upon your Lord to bring forth for us from the earth its green herbs and its cucumbers and its garlic and its lentils and its onions." [Moses] said, "Would you exchange what is better for what is less? Go into [any] settlement and indeed, you will have what you have asked." And they were covered with humiliation and poverty and returned with anger from Allāh [upon them]. That was because they [repeatedly] disbelieved in the signs of Allāh and killed the prophets without right. That was because they disobeyed and were [habitually] transgressing.

ayat.teksArab: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَالَّذِيْنَ هَادُوْا وَالنَّصٰرٰى وَالصَّابِــِٕيْنَ مَنْ اٰمَنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْاٰخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا فَلَهُمْ اَجْرُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْۚ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Innal-lażīna āmanū wal-lażīna hādū wan-naṣārā waṣ-ṣābi'īna man āmana billāhi wal- yaumil-ākhiri wa ‘amila ṣāliḥan fa lahum ajruhum ‘inda rabbihim, wa lā khaufun ‘alaihim wa lā hum yaḥzanūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Indeed, those who believed and those who were Jews or Christians or Sabeans [before Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ)] - those [among them] who believed in Allāh and the Last Day and did righteousness - will have their reward with their Lord, and no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve<sup foot_note=195957>1</sup>.
ayat.teksInggris: Indeed, those who believed and those who were Jews or Christians or Sabeans [before Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ)] - those [among them] who believed in Allāh and the Last Day and did righteousness - will have their reward with their Lord, and no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve<sup foot_note=195957>1</sup>.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ اَخَذْنَا مِيْثَاقَكُمْ وَرَفَعْنَا فَوْقَكُمُ الطُّوْرَۗ خُذُوْا مَآ اٰتَيْنٰكُمْ بِقُوَّةٍ وَّاذْكُرُوْا مَا فِيْهِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż akhażnā mīṡāqakum wa rafa‘nā fauqakumuṭ-ṭūr(a), khużū mā ātainākum biquwwatiw ważkurū mā fīhi la‘allakum tattaqūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when We took your covenant, [O Children of Israel, to abide by the Torah] and We raised over you the mount, [saying], "Take what We have given you with determination and remember what is in it that perhaps you may become righteous."
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when We took your covenant, [O Children of Israel, to abide by the Torah] and We raised over you the mount, [saying], "Take what We have given you with determination and remember what is in it that perhaps you may become righteous."

ayat.teksArab: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ مِّنْۢ بَعْدِ ذٰلِكَ  فَلَوْلَا فَضْلُ اللّٰهِ عَلَيْكُمْ وَرَحْمَتُهٗ لَكُنْتُمْ مِّنَ الْخٰسِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ṡumma tawallaitum mim ba‘di żālika falau lā faḍlullāhi ‘alaikum wa raḥmatuhū lakuntum minal-khāsirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Then you turned away after that. And if not for the favor of Allāh upon you and His mercy, you would have been among the losers.
ayat.teksInggris: Then you turned away after that. And if not for the favor of Allāh upon you and His mercy, you would have been among the losers.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ الَّذِيْنَ اعْتَدَوْا مِنْكُمْ فِى السَّبْتِ فَقُلْنَا لَهُمْ كُوْنُوْا قِرَدَةً خٰسِـِٕيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa laqad ‘alimtumul-lażīna‘tadau minkum fis-sabti faqulnā lahum kūnū qiradatan khāsi'īn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And you had already known about those who transgressed among you concerning the sabbath, and We said to them, "Be apes, despised."
ayat.teksInggris: And you had already known about those who transgressed among you concerning the sabbath, and We said to them, "Be apes, despised."

ayat.teksArab: فَجَعَلْنٰهَا نَكَالًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهَا وَمَا خَلْفَهَا وَمَوْعِظَةً لِّلْمُتَّقِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Faja‘alnāhā nakālal limā baina yadaihā wa mā khalfahā wa mau‘iẓatal lil-muttaqīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And We made it a deterrent punishment for those who were present and those who succeeded [them] and a lesson for those who fear Allāh.
ayat.teksInggris: And We made it a deterrent punishment for those who were present and those who succeeded [them] and a lesson for those who fear Allāh.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ قَالَ مُوْسٰى لِقَوْمِهٖٓ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ يَأْمُرُكُمْ اَنْ تَذْبَحُوْا بَقَرَةً ۗ قَالُوْٓا اَتَتَّخِذُنَا هُزُوًا ۗ قَالَ اَعُوْذُ بِاللّٰهِ اَنْ اَكُوْنَ مِنَ الْجٰهِلِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż qāla mūsā liqaumihī innallāha ya'murukum an tażbaḥū baqarah(tan), qālū atattakhiżunā huzuwā(n), qāla a‘ūżu billāhi an akūna minal-jāhilīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when Moses said to his people, "Indeed, Allāh commands you to slaughter a cow." They said, "Do you take us in ridicule?" He said, "I seek refuge in Allāh from being among the ignorant."
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when Moses said to his people, "Indeed, Allāh commands you to slaughter a cow." They said, "Do you take us in ridicule?" He said, "I seek refuge in Allāh from being among the ignorant."

ayat.teksArab: قَالُوا ادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيِّنْ لَّنَا مَا هِيَ ۗ قَالَ اِنَّهٗ يَقُوْلُ اِنَّهَا بَقَرَةٌ لَّا فَارِضٌ وَّلَا بِكْرٌۗ عَوَانٌۢ بَيْنَ ذٰلِكَ ۗ فَافْعَلُوْا مَا تُؤْمَرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Qālud‘u lanā rabbaka yubayyil lanā mā hiy(a), qāla innahū yaqūlu innahā baqaratul lā fāriḍuw wa lā bikr(un), ‘awānum baina żālik(a), faf‘alū mā tu'marūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: They said, "Call upon your Lord to make clear to us what it is." [Moses] said, "[Allāh] says, 'It is a cow which is neither old nor virgin, but median between that,' so do what you are commanded."
ayat.teksInggris: They said, "Call upon your Lord to make clear to us what it is." [Moses] said, "[Allāh] says, 'It is a cow which is neither old nor virgin, but median between that,' so do what you are commanded."

ayat.teksArab: قَالُوا ادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيِّنْ لَّنَا مَا لَوْنُهَا ۗ قَالَ اِنَّهٗ يَقُوْلُ اِنَّهَا بَقَرَةٌ صَفْرَاۤءُ فَاقِعٌ لَّوْنُهَا تَسُرُّ النّٰظِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Qālud‘u lanā rabbaka yubayyil lanā mā launuhā, qāla innahū yaqūlu innahā baqaratun ṣafrā'u fāqi‘ul launuhā tasurrun-nāẓirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: They said, "Call upon your Lord to show us what is her color." He said, "He says, 'It is a yellow cow, bright in color - pleasing to the observers.'"
ayat.teksInggris: They said, "Call upon your Lord to show us what is her color." He said, "He says, 'It is a yellow cow, bright in color - pleasing to the observers.'"

ayat.teksArab: قَالُوا ادْعُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيِّنْ لَّنَا مَا هِيَۙ اِنَّ الْبَقَرَ تَشٰبَهَ عَلَيْنَاۗ وَاِنَّآ اِنْ شَاۤءَ اللّٰهُ لَمُهْتَدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Qālud‘u lanā rabbaka yubayyil lanā mā hiy(a), innal-baqara tasyābaha ‘alainā, wa innā in syā'allāhu lamuhtadūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: They said, "Call upon your Lord to make clear to us what it is. Indeed, [all] cows look alike to us. And indeed we, if Allāh wills, will be guided."
ayat.teksInggris: They said, "Call upon your Lord to make clear to us what it is. Indeed, [all] cows look alike to us. And indeed we, if Allāh wills, will be guided."

ayat.teksArab: قَالَ اِنَّهٗ يَقُوْلُ اِنَّهَا بَقَرَةٌ لَّا ذَلُوْلٌ تُثِيْرُ الْاَرْضَ وَلَا تَسْقِى الْحَرْثَۚ مُسَلَّمَةٌ لَّاشِيَةَ فِيْهَا ۗ قَالُوا الْـٰٔنَ جِئْتَ بِالْحَقِّ  فَذَبَحُوْهَا وَمَا كَادُوْا يَفْعَلُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Qāla innahū yaqūlu innahā baqaratul lā żalūlun tuṡīrul-arḍa wa lā tasqil-ḥarṡ(a), musallamatul lā syiyata fīhā, qālul-'āna ji'ta bil-ḥaqqi fażabaḥūhā wa mā kādū yaf‘alūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: He said, "He says, 'It is a cow neither trained to plow the earth nor to irrigate the field, one free from fault with no spot upon her.'" They said, "Now you have come with the truth." So they slaughtered her, but they could hardly do it.
ayat.teksInggris: He said, "He says, 'It is a cow neither trained to plow the earth nor to irrigate the field, one free from fault with no spot upon her.'" They said, "Now you have come with the truth." So they slaughtered her, but they could hardly do it.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ قَتَلْتُمْ نَفْسًا فَادّٰرَءْتُمْ فِيْهَا ۗ وَاللّٰهُ مُخْرِجٌ مَّا كُنْتُمْ تَكْتُمُوْنَ ۚ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż qultum nafsan faddāra'tum fīhā, wallāhu mukhrijum mā kuntum taktumūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when you slew a man and disputed<sup foot_note=195958>1</sup> over it, but Allāh was to bring out that which you were concealing.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when you slew a man and disputed<sup foot_note=195958>1</sup> over it, but Allāh was to bring out that which you were concealing.

ayat.teksArab: فَقُلْنَا اضْرِبُوْهُ بِبَعْضِهَاۗ  كَذٰلِكَ يُحْيِ اللّٰهُ الْمَوْتٰى وَيُرِيْكُمْ اٰيٰتِهٖ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَعْقِلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Faqulnaḍribūhu biba‘ḍihā, każālika yuḥyillāhul-mautā wa yurīkum āyātihī la‘allakum ta‘qilūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: So We said, "Strike him [i.e., the slain man] with part of it."<sup foot_note=195959>1</sup> Thus does Allāh bring the dead to life, and He shows you His signs that you might reason.
ayat.teksInggris: So We said, "Strike him [i.e., the slain man] with part of it."<sup foot_note=195959>1</sup> Thus does Allāh bring the dead to life, and He shows you His signs that you might reason.

ayat.teksArab: ثُمَّ قَسَتْ قُلُوْبُكُمْ مِّنْۢ بَعْدِ ذٰلِكَ فَهِيَ كَالْحِجَارَةِ اَوْ اَشَدُّ قَسْوَةً ۗ وَاِنَّ مِنَ الْحِجَارَةِ لَمَا يَتَفَجَّرُ مِنْهُ الْاَنْهٰرُ ۗ وَاِنَّ مِنْهَا لَمَا يَشَّقَّقُ فَيَخْرُجُ مِنْهُ الْمَاۤءُ  ۗوَاِنَّ مِنْهَا لَمَا يَهْبِطُ مِنْ خَشْيَةِ اللّٰهِ ۗوَمَا اللّٰهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ṡumma qasat qulūbukum mim ba‘di żālika fahiya kal-ḥijārati au asyaddu qaswah(tan), wa inna minal-ḥijārati lamā yatafajjaru minhul-anhār(u), wa inna minhā lamā yasysyaqqaqu fayakhruju minhul-mā'(u), wa inna minhā lamā yahbiṭu min khasy-yatillāh(i), wa mallāhu bigāfilin ‘ammā ta‘malūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Then your hearts became hardened after that, being like stones or even harder. For indeed, there are stones from which rivers burst forth, and there are some of them that split open and water comes out, and there are some of them that fall down for fear of Allāh. And Allāh is not unaware of what you do.
ayat.teksInggris: Then your hearts became hardened after that, being like stones or even harder. For indeed, there are stones from which rivers burst forth, and there are some of them that split open and water comes out, and there are some of them that fall down for fear of Allāh. And Allāh is not unaware of what you do.

ayat.teksArab: ۞ اَفَتَطْمَعُوْنَ اَنْ يُّؤْمِنُوْا لَكُمْ وَقَدْ كَانَ فَرِيْقٌ مِّنْهُمْ يَسْمَعُوْنَ كَلَامَ اللّٰهِ ثُمَّ يُحَرِّفُوْنَهٗ مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا عَقَلُوْهُ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Afa taṭma‘ūna ay yu'minū lakum wa qad kāna farīqum minhum yasma‘ūna kalāmallāhi ṡumma yuḥarrifūnahū mim ba‘di mā ‘aqalūhu wa hum ya‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Do you covet [the hope, O believers], that they would believe for you while a party of them used to hear the words of Allāh and then distort it [i.e., the Torah] after they had understood it while they were knowing?
ayat.teksInggris: Do you covet [the hope, O believers], that they would believe for you while a party of them used to hear the words of Allāh and then distort it [i.e., the Torah] after they had understood it while they were knowing?

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذَا لَقُوا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا قَالُوْٓا اٰمَنَّاۚ وَاِذَا خَلَا بَعْضُهُمْ اِلٰى بَعْضٍ قَالُوْٓا اَتُحَدِّثُوْنَهُمْ بِمَا فَتَحَ اللّٰهُ عَلَيْكُمْ لِيُحَاۤجُّوْكُمْ بِهٖ عِنْدَ رَبِّكُمْ ۗ اَفَلَا تَعْقِلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iżā laqul-lażīna āmanū qālū āmannā, wa iżā khalā ba‘ḍuhum ilā ba‘ḍin qālū atuḥaddiṡūnahum bimā fataḥallāhu ‘alaikum liyuḥājjūkum bihī ‘inda rabbikum, afalā ta‘qilūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And when they meet those who believe, they say, "We have believed"; but when they are alone with one another, they say, "Do you talk to them about what Allāh has revealed to you so they can argue with you about it before your Lord?" Then will you not reason?
ayat.teksInggris: And when they meet those who believe, they say, "We have believed"; but when they are alone with one another, they say, "Do you talk to them about what Allāh has revealed to you so they can argue with you about it before your Lord?" Then will you not reason?

ayat.teksArab: اَوَلَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّوْنَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Awalā ya‘lamūna annallāha ya‘lamu mā yusirrūna wa mā yu‘linūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: But do they not know that Allāh knows what they conceal and what they declare?
ayat.teksInggris: But do they not know that Allāh knows what they conceal and what they declare?

ayat.teksArab: وَمِنْهُمْ اُمِّيُّوْنَ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ الْكِتٰبَ اِلَّآ اَمَانِيَّ وَاِنْ هُمْ اِلَّا يَظُنُّوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa minhum umiyyūna lā ya‘lamūnal-kitāba illā amāniyya wa in hum illā yaẓunnūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And among them are unlettered ones who do not know the Scripture except [indulgement in] wishful thinking, but they are only assuming.
ayat.teksInggris: And among them are unlettered ones who do not know the Scripture except [indulgement in] wishful thinking, but they are only assuming.

ayat.teksArab: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِيْنَ يَكْتُبُوْنَ الْكِتٰبَ بِاَيْدِيْهِمْ ثُمَّ يَقُوْلُوْنَ هٰذَا مِنْ عِنْدِ اللّٰهِ لِيَشْتَرُوْا بِهٖ ثَمَنًا قَلِيْلًا ۗفَوَيْلٌ لَّهُمْ مِّمَّا كَتَبَتْ اَيْدِيْهِمْ وَوَيْلٌ لَّهُمْ مِّمَّا يَكْسِبُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Fawailul lil-lażīna yaktubūnal-kitāba bi'aidīhim ṡumma yaqūlūna hāżā min ‘indillāhi liyasytarū bihī ṡamanan qalīlā(n), fawailul lahum mimmā katabat aidīhim wa wailul lahum mimmā yaksibūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: So woe<sup foot_note=195960>1</sup> to those who write the "scripture" with their own hands, then say, "This is from Allāh," in order to exchange it for a small price. Woe to them for what their hands have written and woe to them for what they earn.
ayat.teksInggris: So woe<sup foot_note=195960>1</sup> to those who write the "scripture" with their own hands, then say, "This is from Allāh," in order to exchange it for a small price. Woe to them for what their hands have written and woe to them for what they earn.

ayat.teksArab: وَقَالُوْا لَنْ تَمَسَّنَا النَّارُ اِلَّآ اَيَّامًا مَّعْدُوْدَةً ۗ قُلْ اَتَّخَذْتُمْ عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ عَهْدًا فَلَنْ يُّخْلِفَ اللّٰهُ عَهْدَهٗٓ اَمْ تَقُوْلُوْنَ عَلَى اللّٰهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qālū lan tamassanan-nāru illā ayyāmam ma‘dūdah (tan), qul attakhażtum ‘indallāhi ‘ahdan falay yukhlifallāhu ‘ahdahū am taqūlūna ‘alallāhi mā lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And they say, "Never will the Fire touch us, except for [a few] numbered days." Say, "Have you taken a covenant with Allāh? For Allāh will never break His covenant. Or do you say about Allāh that which you do not know?"
ayat.teksInggris: And they say, "Never will the Fire touch us, except for [a few] numbered days." Say, "Have you taken a covenant with Allāh? For Allāh will never break His covenant. Or do you say about Allāh that which you do not know?"

ayat.teksArab: بَلٰى مَنْ كَسَبَ سَيِّئَةً وَّاَحَاطَتْ بِهٖ خَطِيْۤـَٔتُهٗ فَاُولٰۤىِٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ النَّارِ ۚ هُمْ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Balā man kasaba sayyi'ataw wa aḥāṭat bihī khaṭī'atuhū fa ulā'ika aṣḥābun-nār(i), hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Yes, [on the contrary], whoever earns evil and his sin has encompassed him - those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.
ayat.teksInggris: Yes, [on the contrary], whoever earns evil and his sin has encompassed him - those are the companions of the Fire; they will abide therein eternally.

ayat.teksArab: وَالَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ الْجَنَّةِ ۚ هُمْ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Wal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti ulā'ika aṣḥābul-jannah(ti), hum fīhā khālidūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: But they who believe and do righteous deeds - those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide therein eternally.
ayat.teksInggris: But they who believe and do righteous deeds - those are the companions of Paradise; they will abide therein eternally.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ اَخَذْنَا مِيْثَاقَ بَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ لَا تَعْبُدُوْنَ اِلَّا اللّٰهَ وَبِالْوَالِدَيْنِ اِحْسَانًا وَّذِى الْقُرْبٰى وَالْيَتٰمٰى وَالْمَسٰكِيْنِ وَقُوْلُوْا لِلنَّاسِ حُسْنًا وَّاَقِيْمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَاٰتُوا الزَّكٰوةَۗ  ثُمَّ تَوَلَّيْتُمْ اِلَّا قَلِيْلًا مِّنْكُمْ وَاَنْتُمْ مُّعْرِضُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż akhażnā mīṡāqa banī isrā'īla lā ta‘budūna illallāha wa bil-wālidaini iḥsānaw wa żil-qurbā wal-yatāmā wal-masākīni wa qūlū lin-nāsi ḥusnaw wa aqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātuz-zakāh(ta), ṡumma tawallaitum illā qalīlam minkum wa antum mu‘riḍūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when We took the covenant from the Children of Israel, [enjoining upon them], "Do not worship except Allāh; and to parents do good and to relatives, orphans, and the needy. And speak to people good [words] and establish prayer and give zakāh." Then you turned away, except a few of you, and you were refusing.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when We took the covenant from the Children of Israel, [enjoining upon them], "Do not worship except Allāh; and to parents do good and to relatives, orphans, and the needy. And speak to people good [words] and establish prayer and give zakāh." Then you turned away, except a few of you, and you were refusing.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ اَخَذْنَا مِيْثَاقَكُمْ لَا تَسْفِكُوْنَ دِمَاۤءَكُمْ وَلَا تُخْرِجُوْنَ اَنْفُسَكُمْ مِّنْ دِيَارِكُمْ ۖ ثُمَّ اَقْرَرْتُمْ وَاَنْتُمْ تَشْهَدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż akhażnā mīṡāqakum lā tasfikūna dimā'akum wa lā tukhrijūna anfusakum min diyārikum ṡumma aqrartum wa antum tasyhadūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when We took your covenant, [saying], "Do not shed your [i.e., each other's] blood or evict one another from your homes." Then you acknowledged [this] while you were witnessing.
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when We took your covenant, [saying], "Do not shed your [i.e., each other's] blood or evict one another from your homes." Then you acknowledged [this] while you were witnessing.

ayat.teksArab: ثُمَّ اَنْتُمْ هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ تَقْتُلُوْنَ اَنْفُسَكُمْ وَتُخْرِجُوْنَ فَرِيْقًا مِّنْكُمْ مِّنْ دِيَارِهِمْۖ تَظٰهَرُوْنَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِالْاِثْمِ وَالْعُدْوَانِۗ وَاِنْ يَّأْتُوْكُمْ اُسٰرٰى تُفٰدُوْهُمْ وَهُوَ مُحَرَّمٌ عَلَيْكُمْ اِخْرَاجُهُمْ ۗ اَفَتُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِبَعْضِ الْكِتٰبِ وَتَكْفُرُوْنَ بِبَعْضٍۚ  فَمَا جَزَاۤءُ مَنْ يَّفْعَلُ ذٰلِكَ مِنْكُمْ اِلَّا خِزْيٌ فِى الْحَيٰوةِ الدُّنْيَا ۚوَيَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ يُرَدُّوْنَ اِلٰٓى  اَشَدِّ الْعَذَابِۗ وَمَا اللّٰهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ṡumma antum hā'ulā'i taqtulūna anfusakum wa tukhrijūna farīqam minkum min diyārihim taẓāharūna ‘alaihim bil-iṡmi wal-‘udwān(i), wa iy ya'tūkum usārā tufādūhum wa huwa muḥarramun ‘alaikum ikhrājuhum, afa tu'minūna biba‘ḍil-kitābi wa takfurūna bi ba‘ḍ(in), famā jazā'u may yaf‘alu żālika minkum illā khizyun fil-ḥayātid-dun-yā, wa yaumal-qiyāmati yuraddūna ilā asyaddil-‘ażāb(i), wa mallāhu bigāfilin ‘ammā ta‘malūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Then, you are those [same ones who are] killing one another and evicting a party of your people from their homes, cooperating against them in sin and aggression. And if they come to you as captives, you ransom them, although their eviction was forbidden to you. So do you believe in part of the Scripture and disbelieve in part? Then what is the recompense for those who do that among you except disgrace in worldly life; and on the Day of Resurrection they will be sent back to the severest of punishment. And Allāh is not unaware of what you do.
ayat.teksInggris: Then, you are those [same ones who are] killing one another and evicting a party of your people from their homes, cooperating against them in sin and aggression. And if they come to you as captives, you ransom them, although their eviction was forbidden to you. So do you believe in part of the Scripture and disbelieve in part? Then what is the recompense for those who do that among you except disgrace in worldly life; and on the Day of Resurrection they will be sent back to the severest of punishment. And Allāh is not unaware of what you do.

ayat.teksArab: اُولٰۤىِٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ اشْتَرَوُا الْحَيٰوةَ الدُّنْيَا بِالْاٰخِرَةِ ۖ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمُ الْعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Ulā'ikal-lażīnasytarawul-ḥayātad-dun-yā bil-ākhirah(ti), falā yukhaffafu ‘anhumul-‘ażābu wa lā hum yunṣarūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Those are the ones who have bought the life of this world [in exchange] for the Hereafter, so the punishment will not be lightened for them, nor will they be aided.
ayat.teksInggris: Those are the ones who have bought the life of this world [in exchange] for the Hereafter, so the punishment will not be lightened for them, nor will they be aided.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَقَدْ اٰتَيْنَا مُوْسَى الْكِتٰبَ وَقَفَّيْنَا مِنْۢ بَعْدِهٖ بِالرُّسُلِ ۖ وَاٰتَيْنَا عِيْسَى ابْنَ مَرْيَمَ الْبَيِّنٰتِ وَاَيَّدْنٰهُ بِرُوْحِ الْقُدُسِۗ  اَفَكُلَّمَا جَاۤءَكُمْ رَسُوْلٌۢ بِمَا لَا تَهْوٰىٓ اَنْفُسُكُمُ اسْتَكْبَرْتُمْ ۚ فَفَرِيْقًا كَذَّبْتُمْ وَفَرِيْقًا تَقْتُلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa laqad ātainā mūsal-kitāba wa qaffainā mim ba‘dihī bir-rusul(i), wa ātainā ‘īsabna maryamal-bayyināti wa ayyadnāhu birūḥil-qudus(i), afakullamā jā'akum rasūlum bimā lā tahwā anfusukumustakbartum, fafarīqan każżabtum wa farīqan taqtulūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And We did certainly give Moses the Scripture [i.e., the Torah] and followed up after him with messengers. And We gave Jesus, the son of Mary, clear proofs and supported him with the Pure Spirit [i.e., the angel Gabriel]. But is it [not] that every time a messenger came to you, [O Children of Israel], with what your souls did not desire, you were arrogant? And a party [of messengers] you denied and another party you killed.
ayat.teksInggris: And We did certainly give Moses the Scripture [i.e., the Torah] and followed up after him with messengers. And We gave Jesus, the son of Mary, clear proofs and supported him with the Pure Spirit [i.e., the angel Gabriel]. But is it [not] that every time a messenger came to you, [O Children of Israel], with what your souls did not desire, you were arrogant? And a party [of messengers] you denied and another party you killed.

ayat.teksArab: وَقَالُوْا قُلُوْبُنَا غُلْفٌ ۗ بَلْ لَّعَنَهُمُ اللّٰهُ بِكُفْرِهِمْ فَقَلِيْلًا مَّا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qālū qulūbunā gulf(un), bal la‘anahumullāhu bikufrihim faqalīlam mā yu'minūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And they said, "Our hearts are wrapped."<sup foot_note=195961>1</sup> But, [in fact], Allāh has cursed them for their disbelief, so little is it that they believe.
ayat.teksInggris: And they said, "Our hearts are wrapped."<sup foot_note=195961>1</sup> But, [in fact], Allāh has cursed them for their disbelief, so little is it that they believe.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَمَّا جَاۤءَهُمْ كِتٰبٌ مِّنْ عِنْدِ اللّٰهِ مُصَدِّقٌ لِّمَا مَعَهُمْۙ وَكَانُوْا مِنْ قَبْلُ يَسْتَفْتِحُوْنَ عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْاۚ فَلَمَّا جَاۤءَهُمْ مَّا عَرَفُوْا كَفَرُوْا بِهٖ ۖ فَلَعْنَةُ اللّٰهِ عَلَى الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lammā jā'akum kitābum min ‘indillāhi muṣaddiqul limā ma‘ahum, wa kānū min qablu yastaftiḥūna ‘alal-lażīna kafarū, falammā jā'ahum mā ‘arafū kafarū bih(ī), fala‘natullāhi ‘alal-kāfirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And when there came to them a Book [i.e., the Qur’ān] from Allāh confirming that which was with them - although before they used to pray for victory against those who disbelieved - but [then] when there came to them that which they recognized, they disbelieved in it; so the curse of Allāh will be upon the disbelievers.
ayat.teksInggris: And when there came to them a Book [i.e., the Qur’ān] from Allāh confirming that which was with them - although before they used to pray for victory against those who disbelieved - but [then] when there came to them that which they recognized, they disbelieved in it; so the curse of Allāh will be upon the disbelievers.

ayat.teksArab: بِئْسَمَا اشْتَرَوْا بِهٖٓ اَنْفُسَهُمْ اَنْ يَّكْفُرُوْا بِمَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ بَغْيًا اَنْ يُّنَزِّلَ اللّٰهُ مِنْ فَضْلِهٖ عَلٰى مَنْ يَّشَاۤءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهٖ ۚ فَبَاۤءُوْ بِغَضَبٍ عَلٰى غَضَبٍۗ وَلِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ عَذَابٌ مُّهِيْنٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Bi'samasytarau bihī anfusahum ay yakfurū bimā anzalallāhu bagyan ay yunazzilallāhu min faḍlihī ‘alā may yasyā'u min ‘ibādih(ī), fabā'ū bigaḍabin ‘alā gaḍab(in), wa lil-kāfirīna ‘ażābum muhīn(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: How wretched is that for which they sold themselves - that they would disbelieve in what Allāh has revealed through [their] outrage that Allāh would send down His favor upon whom He wills from among His servants. So they returned having [earned] wrath upon wrath. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment.
ayat.teksInggris: How wretched is that for which they sold themselves - that they would disbelieve in what Allāh has revealed through [their] outrage that Allāh would send down His favor upon whom He wills from among His servants. So they returned having [earned] wrath upon wrath. And for the disbelievers is a humiliating punishment.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذَا قِيْلَ لَهُمْ اٰمِنُوْا بِمَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ قَالُوْا نُؤْمِنُ بِمَآ اُنْزِلَ عَلَيْنَا وَيَكْفُرُوْنَ بِمَا وَرَاۤءَهٗ وَهُوَ الْحَقُّ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا مَعَهُمْ ۗ قُلْ فَلِمَ تَقْتُلُوْنَ اَنْۢبِيَاۤءَ اللّٰهِ مِنْ قَبْلُ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iżā qīla lahum āminū bimā anzalallāhu qālū nu'minu bimā unzila ‘alainā wa yakfurūna bimā warā'ah(ū), wa huwal-ḥaqqu muṣaddiqal limā ma‘ahum, qul falima taqtulūna ambiyā'allāhi min qablu in kuntum mu'minīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And when it is said to them, "Believe in what Allāh has revealed," they say, "We believe [only] in what was revealed to us." And they disbelieve in what came after it, while it is the truth confirming that which is with them. Say, "Then why did you kill the prophets of Allāh before, if you are [indeed] believers?"
ayat.teksInggris: And when it is said to them, "Believe in what Allāh has revealed," they say, "We believe [only] in what was revealed to us." And they disbelieve in what came after it, while it is the truth confirming that which is with them. Say, "Then why did you kill the prophets of Allāh before, if you are [indeed] believers?"

ayat.teksArab: ۞ وَلَقَدْ جَاۤءَكُمْ مُّوْسٰى بِالْبَيِّنٰتِ ثُمَّ اتَّخَذْتُمُ الْعِجْلَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِهٖ وَاَنْتُمْ ظٰلِمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa laqad jā'akum mūsā bil-bayyināti ṡummattakhażtumul-‘ijla mim ba‘dihī wa antum ẓālimūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And Moses had certainly brought you clear proofs. Then you took the calf [in worship] after that, while you were wrongdoers.
ayat.teksInggris: And Moses had certainly brought you clear proofs. Then you took the calf [in worship] after that, while you were wrongdoers.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ اَخَذْنَا مِيْثَاقَكُمْ وَرَفَعْنَا فَوْقَكُمُ الطُّوْرَۗ خُذُوْا مَآ اٰتَيْنٰكُمْ بِقُوَّةٍ وَّاسْمَعُوْا ۗ قَالُوْا سَمِعْنَا وَعَصَيْنَا وَاُشْرِبُوْا فِيْ قُلُوْبِهِمُ الْعِجْلَ بِكُفْرِهِمْ ۗ قُلْ بِئْسَمَا يَأْمُرُكُمْ بِهٖٓ اِيْمَانُكُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ مُّؤْمِنِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż akhażnā mīṡāqakum wa rafa‘nā fauqakumuṭ-ṭūr(a), khużū mā ātainākum biquwwatiw wasma‘ū, qālū sami‘nā wa ‘aṣainā, wa usyribū fī qulūbihimul-‘ijla bikufrihim, qul bi'samā ya'murukum bihī īmānukum in kuntum mu'minīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [recall] when We took your covenant and raised over you the mount, [saying], "Take what We have given you with determination and listen." They said [instead], "We hear and disobey." And their hearts absorbed [the worship of] the calf because of their disbelief. Say, "How wretched is that which your faith enjoins upon you, if you should be believers."
ayat.teksInggris: And [recall] when We took your covenant and raised over you the mount, [saying], "Take what We have given you with determination and listen." They said [instead], "We hear and disobey." And their hearts absorbed [the worship of] the calf because of their disbelief. Say, "How wretched is that which your faith enjoins upon you, if you should be believers."

ayat.teksArab: قُلْ اِنْ كَانَتْ لَكُمُ الدَّارُ الْاٰخِرَةُ عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ خَالِصَةً مِّنْ دُوْنِ النَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُا الْمَوْتَ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ صٰدِقِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Qul in kānat lakumud-dārul-ākhiratu ‘indallāhi khāliṣatam min dūnin-nāsi fatamannawul-mauta in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Say, [O Muḥammad], "If the home of the Hereafter with Allāh is for you alone and not the [other] people, then wish for death, if you should be truthful."
ayat.teksInggris: Say, [O Muḥammad], "If the home of the Hereafter with Allāh is for you alone and not the [other] people, then wish for death, if you should be truthful."

ayat.teksArab: وَلَنْ يَّتَمَنَّوْهُ اَبَدًاۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ اَيْدِيْهِمْ ۗ وَاللّٰهُ عَلِيْمٌ ۢ بِالظّٰلِمِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lay yatamannauhu abadam bima qaddamat aidīhim, wallāhu ‘alīmum biẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: But never will they wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allāh is Knowing of the wrongdoers.
ayat.teksInggris: But never will they wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allāh is Knowing of the wrongdoers.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَتَجِدَنَّهُمْ اَحْرَصَ النَّاسِ عَلٰى حَيٰوةٍ ۛوَمِنَ الَّذِيْنَ اَشْرَكُوْا ۛيَوَدُّ اَحَدُهُمْ لَوْ يُعَمَّرُ اَلْفَ سَنَةٍۚ وَمَا هُوَ بِمُزَحْزِحِهٖ مِنَ الْعَذَابِ اَنْ يُّعَمَّرَۗ وَاللّٰهُ بَصِيْرٌۢ بِمَا يَعْمَلُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa latajidannahum aḥraṣan-nāsi ‘alā ḥayāh(tin), wa minal-lażīna asyrakū, yawaddu aḥaduhum lau yu‘ammaru alfa sanah(tin), wa mā huwa bi muzaḥziḥihī minal-‘ażābi ay yu‘ammar(a), wallāhu baṣīrum bimā ya‘malūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And you will surely find them the most greedy of people for life - [even] more than those who associate others with Allāh. One of them wishes that he could be granted life a thousand years, but it would not remove him in the least from the [coming] punishment that he should be granted life. And Allāh is Seeing of what they do.
ayat.teksInggris: And you will surely find them the most greedy of people for life - [even] more than those who associate others with Allāh. One of them wishes that he could be granted life a thousand years, but it would not remove him in the least from the [coming] punishment that he should be granted life. And Allāh is Seeing of what they do.

ayat.teksArab: قُلْ مَنْ كَانَ عَدُوًّا لِّجِبْرِيْلَ فَاِنَّهٗ نَزَّلَهٗ عَلٰى قَلْبِكَ بِاِذْنِ اللّٰهِ مُصَدِّقًا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ وَهُدًى وَّبُشْرٰى لِلْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Qul man kāna ‘aduwwal lijibrīla fa'innahū nazzalahū ‘alā qalbika bi iżnillāhi muṣaddiqal limā baina yadaihi wa hudaw wa busyrā lil-mu'minīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Say, "Whoever is an enemy to Gabriel - it is [none but] he who has brought it [i.e., the Qur’ān] down upon your heart, [O Muḥammad], by permission of Allāh, confirming that which was before it and as guidance and good tidings for the believers."
ayat.teksInggris: Say, "Whoever is an enemy to Gabriel - it is [none but] he who has brought it [i.e., the Qur’ān] down upon your heart, [O Muḥammad], by permission of Allāh, confirming that which was before it and as guidance and good tidings for the believers."

ayat.teksArab: مَنْ كَانَ عَدُوًّا لِّلّٰهِ وَمَلٰۤىِٕكَتِهٖ وَرُسُلِهٖ وَجِبْرِيْلَ وَمِيْكٰىلَ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَدُوٌّ لِّلْكٰفِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Man kāna ‘aduwwal lillāhi wa malā'ikatihī wa rusulihī wa jibrīla wa mīkāla fa innallāha ‘aduwwul lil-kāfirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Whoever is an enemy to Allāh and His angels and His messengers and Gabriel and Michael - then indeed, Allāh is an enemy to the disbelievers.
ayat.teksInggris: Whoever is an enemy to Allāh and His angels and His messengers and Gabriel and Michael - then indeed, Allāh is an enemy to the disbelievers.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَقَدْ اَنْزَلْنَآ اِلَيْكَ اٰيٰتٍۢ بَيِّنٰتٍۚ وَمَا يَكْفُرُ بِهَآ اِلَّا الْفٰسِقُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa laqad anzalnā ilaika āyātim bayyināt(in), wa mā yakfuru bihā illal-fāsiqūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And We have certainly revealed to you verses [which are] clear proofs, and no one would deny them except the defiantly disobedient.
ayat.teksInggris: And We have certainly revealed to you verses [which are] clear proofs, and no one would deny them except the defiantly disobedient.

ayat.teksArab: اَوَكُلَّمَا عٰهَدُوْا عَهْدًا نَّبَذَهٗ فَرِيْقٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۗ بَلْ اَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Awa kullamā ‘āhadū ‘ahdan nabażahū farīqum minhum, bal akṡaruhum lā yu'minūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Is it not [true] that every time they took a covenant a party of them threw it away? But, [in fact], most of them do not believe.
ayat.teksInggris: Is it not [true] that every time they took a covenant a party of them threw it away? But, [in fact], most of them do not believe.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَمَّا جَاۤءَهُمْ رَسُوْلٌ مِّنْ عِنْدِ اللّٰهِ مُصَدِّقٌ لِّمَا مَعَهُمْ نَبَذَ فَرِيْقٌ مِّنَ الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْكِتٰبَۙ  كِتٰبَ اللّٰهِ وَرَاۤءَ ظُهُوْرِهِمْ كَاَنَّهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَۖ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lammā jā'ahum rasūlum min ‘indillāhi muṣaddiqul limā ma‘ahum nabaża farīqum minal-lażīna ūtul-kitāb(a), kitāballāhi warā'a ẓuhūrihim ka'annahum lā ya‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And when a messenger from Allāh came to them confirming that which was with them, a party of those who had been given the Scripture threw the Scripture of Allāh [i.e., the Torah] behind their backs as if they did not know [what it contained].
ayat.teksInggris: And when a messenger from Allāh came to them confirming that which was with them, a party of those who had been given the Scripture threw the Scripture of Allāh [i.e., the Torah] behind their backs as if they did not know [what it contained].

ayat.teksArab: وَاتَّبَعُوْا مَا تَتْلُوا الشَّيٰطِيْنُ عَلٰى مُلْكِ سُلَيْمٰنَ ۚ وَمَا كَفَرَ سُلَيْمٰنُ وَلٰكِنَّ الشَّيٰطِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا يُعَلِّمُوْنَ النَّاسَ السِّحْرَ وَمَآ اُنْزِلَ عَلَى الْمَلَكَيْنِ بِبَابِلَ هَارُوْتَ وَمَارُوْتَ ۗ وَمَا يُعَلِّمٰنِ مِنْ اَحَدٍ حَتّٰى يَقُوْلَآ اِنَّمَا نَحْنُ فِتْنَةٌ فَلَا تَكْفُرْ ۗ فَيَتَعَلَّمُوْنَ مِنْهُمَا مَا يُفَرِّقُوْنَ بِهٖ بَيْنَ الْمَرْءِ وَزَوْجِهٖ ۗ وَمَا هُمْ بِضَاۤرِّيْنَ بِهٖ مِنْ اَحَدٍ اِلَّا بِاِذْنِ اللّٰهِ ۗ وَيَتَعَلَّمُوْنَ مَا يَضُرُّهُمْ وَلَا يَنْفَعُهُمْ ۗ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمُوْا لَمَنِ اشْتَرٰىهُ مَا لَهٗ فِى الْاٰخِرَةِ مِنْ خَلَاقٍ ۗ وَلَبِئْسَ مَاشَرَوْا بِهٖٓ اَنْفُسَهُمْ ۗ  لَوْ كَانُوْا يَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wattaba‘ū mā tatlusy-syayāṭīnu ‘alā mulki sulaimān(a), wa mā kafara sulaimānu wa lākinnnasy-syayāṭīna kafarū yu‘allimūnan-nāsas siḥr(a), wa mā unzila ‘alal-malakaini bibābila hārūta wa mārūt(a), wa mā yu‘allimāni min aḥadin ḥattā yaqūlā innamā naḥnu fitnatun falā takfur, fayata‘allamūna minhumā mā yufarriqūna bihī bainal-mar'i wa zaujih(ī), wa mā hum biḍarrīna bihī min aḥadin illā bi'iżnillāh(i), wa yata‘allamūna mā yaḍurruhum wa lā yanfa‘uhum, wa laqad ‘alimū lamanisytarāhu mā lahū fil-ākhirati min khalāq(in), wa labi'sa mā syarau bihī anfusahum, lau kānū ya‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And they followed [instead] what the devils had recited during the reign of Solomon. It was not Solomon who disbelieved, but the devils disbelieved, teaching people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Hārūt and Mārūt. But they [i.e., the two angels] do not teach anyone unless they say, "We are a trial, so do not disbelieve [by practicing magic]."<sup foot_note=195962>1</sup> And [yet] they learn from them that by which they cause separation between a man and his wife. But they do not harm anyone through it except by permission of Allāh. And they [i.e., people] learn what harms them and does not benefit them. But they [i.e., the Children of Israel] certainly knew that whoever purchased it [i.e., magic] would not have in the Hereafter any share. And wretched is that for which they sold themselves, if they only knew.
ayat.teksInggris: And they followed [instead] what the devils had recited during the reign of Solomon. It was not Solomon who disbelieved, but the devils disbelieved, teaching people magic and that which was revealed to the two angels at Babylon, Hārūt and Mārūt. But they [i.e., the two angels] do not teach anyone unless they say, "We are a trial, so do not disbelieve [by practicing magic]."<sup foot_note=195962>1</sup> And [yet] they learn from them that by which they cause separation between a man and his wife.
