But they do not harm anyone through it except by permission of Allāh. And they [i.e., people] learn what harms them and does not benefit them. But they [i.e., the Children of Israel] certainly knew that whoever purchased it [i.e., magic] would not have in the Hereafter any share. And wretched is that for which they sold themselves, if they only knew.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَوْ اَنَّهُمْ اٰمَنُوْا وَاتَّقَوْا لَمَثُوْبَةٌ مِّنْ عِنْدِ اللّٰهِ خَيْرٌ ۗ  لَوْ كَانُوْا يَعْلَمُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lau annahum āmanū wattaqau lamaṡūbatum min ‘indillāhi khair(un), lau kānū ya‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And if they had believed and feared Allāh, then the reward from Allāh would have been [far] better, if they only knew.
ayat.teksInggris: And if they had believed and feared Allāh, then the reward from Allāh would have been [far] better, if they only knew.

ayat.teksArab: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا لَا تَقُوْلُوْا رَاعِنَا وَقُوْلُوا انْظُرْنَا وَاسْمَعُوْا  وَلِلْكٰفِرِيْنَ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū lā taqūlū rā‘inā wa qūlunẓurnā wasma‘ū wa lil-kāfirīna ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O you who have believed, say not [to Allāh's Messenger], "Rāʿinā" but say, "Unẓurnā"<sup foot_note=195963>1</sup> and listen. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.
ayat.teksInggris: O you who have believed, say not [to Allāh's Messenger], "Rāʿinā" but say, "Unẓurnā"<sup foot_note=195963>1</sup> and listen. And for the disbelievers is a painful punishment.

ayat.teksArab: مَا يَوَدُّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا مِنْ اَهْلِ الْكِتٰبِ وَلَا الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ اَنْ يُّنَزَّلَ عَلَيْكُمْ مِّنْ خَيْرٍ مِّنْ رَّبِّكُمْ ۗ وَاللّٰهُ يَخْتَصُّ بِرَحْمَتِهٖ مَنْ يَّشَاۤءُ ۗ وَاللّٰهُ ذُو الْفَضْلِ الْعَظِيْمِ
ayat.teksLatin: Mā yawaddul-lażīna kafarū min ahlil-kitābi wa lal-musyrikīna ay yunazzila ‘alaikum min khairim mir rabbikum, wallāhu yakhtaṣṣu biraḥmatihī may yasyā'(u), wallāhu żul faḍlil-‘aẓīm(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Neither those who disbelieve from the People of the Scripture [i.e., the Jews and Christians] nor the polytheists wish that any good should be sent down to you from your Lord. But Allāh selects for His mercy whom He wills, and Allāh is the possessor of great bounty.
ayat.teksInggris: Neither those who disbelieve from the People of the Scripture [i.e., the Jews and Christians] nor the polytheists wish that any good should be sent down to you from your Lord. But Allāh selects for His mercy whom He wills, and Allāh is the possessor of great bounty.

ayat.teksArab: ۞ مَا نَنْسَخْ مِنْ اٰيَةٍ اَوْ نُنْسِهَا نَأْتِ بِخَيْرٍ مِّنْهَآ اَوْ مِثْلِهَا ۗ اَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Mā nansakh min āyatin au nunsihā na'ti bi khairim minhā au miṡlihā, alam ta‘lam annallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: We do not abrogate a verse or cause it to be forgotten except that We bring forth [one] better than it or similar to it. Do you not know that Allāh is over all things competent?
ayat.teksInggris: We do not abrogate a verse or cause it to be forgotten except that We bring forth [one] better than it or similar to it. Do you not know that Allāh is over all things competent?

ayat.teksArab: اَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ اَنَّ اللّٰهَ لَهٗ مُلْكُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ ۗ وَمَا لَكُمْ مِّنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ مِنْ وَّلِيٍّ وَّلَا نَصِيْرٍ
ayat.teksLatin: Alam ta‘lam annallāha lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal arḍ(i), wa mā lakum min dūnillāhi miw waliyyiw wa lā naṣīr(in).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Do you not know that to Allāh belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and [that] you have not besides Allāh any protector or any helper?
ayat.teksInggris: Do you not know that to Allāh belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and [that] you have not besides Allāh any protector or any helper?

ayat.teksArab: اَمْ تُرِيْدُوْنَ اَنْ تَسْـَٔلُوْا رَسُوْلَكُمْ كَمَا سُىِٕلَ مُوْسٰى مِنْ قَبْلُ ۗوَمَنْ يَّتَبَدَّلِ الْكُفْرَ بِالْاِيْمَانِ فَقَدْ ضَلَّ سَوَاۤءَ السَّبِيْلِ
ayat.teksLatin: Am turīdūna an tas'alū rasūlakum kamā su'ila mūsā min qabl(u), wa may yatabaddalil-kufra bil-īmāni faqad ḍalla sawā'as-sabīl(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Or do you intend to ask<sup foot_note=195964>1</sup> your Messenger as Moses was asked before? And whoever exchanges faith for disbelief has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way.
ayat.teksInggris: Or do you intend to ask<sup foot_note=195964>1</sup> your Messenger as Moses was asked before? And whoever exchanges faith for disbelief has certainly strayed from the soundness of the way.

ayat.teksArab: وَدَّ كَثِيْرٌ مِّنْ اَهْلِ الْكِتٰبِ لَوْ يَرُدُّوْنَكُمْ مِّنْۢ بَعْدِ اِيْمَانِكُمْ كُفَّارًاۚ حَسَدًا مِّنْ عِنْدِ اَنْفُسِهِمْ مِّنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الْحَقُّ ۚ فَاعْفُوْا وَاصْفَحُوْا حَتّٰى يَأْتِيَ اللّٰهُ بِاَمْرِهٖ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Wadda kaṡīrum min ahlil-kitābi lau yaruddūnakum mim ba‘di īmānikum kuffārā(n), ḥasadam min ‘indi anfusihim mim ba‘di mā tabayyana lahumul-ḥaqq(u), fa‘fū waṣfaḥū ḥattā ya'tiyallāhu bi amrih(ī), innallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Many of the People of the Scripture wish they could turn you back to disbelief after you have believed, out of envy from themselves [even] after the truth has become clear to them. So pardon and overlook until Allāh delivers His command. Indeed, Allāh is over all things competent.
ayat.teksInggris: Many of the People of the Scripture wish they could turn you back to disbelief after you have believed, out of envy from themselves [even] after the truth has become clear to them. So pardon and overlook until Allāh delivers His command. Indeed, Allāh is over all things competent.

ayat.teksArab: وَاَقِيْمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَاٰتُوا الزَّكٰوةَ ۗ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوْا لِاَنْفُسِكُمْ مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوْهُ عِنْدَ اللّٰهِ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ بِمَا تَعْمَلُوْنَ بَصِيْرٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa aqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa ātuz-zakāh(ta), wa mā tuqaddimū li'anfusikum min khairin tajidūhu ‘indallāh(i), innallāha bimā ta‘malūna baṣīr(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And establish prayer and give zakāh, and whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allāh. Indeed Allāh, of what you do, is Seeing.
ayat.teksInggris: And establish prayer and give zakāh, and whatever good you put forward for yourselves - you will find it with Allāh. Indeed Allāh, of what you do, is Seeing.

ayat.teksArab: وَقَالُوْا لَنْ يَّدْخُلَ الْجَنَّةَ اِلَّا مَنْ كَانَ هُوْدًا اَوْ نَصٰرٰى ۗ تِلْكَ اَمَانِيُّهُمْ ۗ قُلْ هَاتُوْا بُرْهَانَكُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ صٰدِقِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qālū lay yadkhulal-jannata illā man kāna hūdan au naṣārā, tilka amāniyyuhum, qul hātū burhānakum in kuntum ṣādiqīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And they say, "None will enter Paradise except one who is a Jew or a Christian." That is [merely] their wishful thinking. Say, "Produce your proof, if you should be truthful."
ayat.teksInggris: And they say, "None will enter Paradise except one who is a Jew or a Christian." That is [merely] their wishful thinking. Say, "Produce your proof, if you should be truthful."

ayat.teksArab: بَلٰى مَنْ اَسْلَمَ وَجْهَهٗ لِلّٰهِ وَهُوَ مُحْسِنٌ فَلَهٗٓ اَجْرُهٗ عِنْدَ رَبِّهٖۖ وَلَا خَوْفٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Balā man aslama wajhahū lillāhi wa huwa muḥsinun falahū ajruhū ‘inda rabbih(i), wa lā khaufun ‘alaihim wa lā hum yaḥzanūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Yes, [on the contrary], whoever submits his face [i.e., self] in Islām to Allāh while being a doer of good will have his reward with his Lord. And no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.
ayat.teksInggris: Yes, [on the contrary], whoever submits his face [i.e., self] in Islām to Allāh while being a doer of good will have his reward with his Lord. And no fear will there be concerning them, nor will they grieve.

ayat.teksArab: وَقَالَتِ الْيَهُوْدُ لَيْسَتِ النَّصٰرٰى عَلٰى شَيْءٍۖ وَّقَالَتِ النَّصٰرٰى لَيْسَتِ الْيَهُوْدُ عَلٰى شَيْءٍۙ وَّهُمْ يَتْلُوْنَ الْكِتٰبَۗ  كَذٰلِكَ قَالَ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ مِثْلَ قَوْلِهِمْ ۚ فَاللّٰهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ فِيْمَا كَانُوْا فِيْهِ يَخْتَلِفُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qālatil-yahūdu laisatin-naṣārā  ‘alā syai'(in), wa qālatin-naṣārā laisatil-yahūdu ‘alā syai'(in), wa hum yatlūnal-kitāb(a), każālika qālal-lażīna lā ya‘lamūna  miṡla qaulihim, fallāhu yaḥkumu bainahum yaumal-qiyāmati fīmā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: The Jews say, "The Christians have nothing [true] to stand on," and the Christians say, "The Jews have nothing to stand on," although they [both] recite the Scripture. Thus do those who know not [i.e., the polytheists] speak the same as their words. But Allāh will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.
ayat.teksInggris: The Jews say, "The Christians have nothing [true] to stand on," and the Christians say, "The Jews have nothing to stand on," although they [both] recite the Scripture. Thus do those who know not [i.e., the polytheists] speak the same as their words. But Allāh will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which they used to differ.

ayat.teksArab: وَمَنْ اَظْلَمُ مِمَّنْ مَّنَعَ مَسٰجِدَ اللّٰهِ اَنْ يُّذْكَرَ فِيْهَا اسْمُهٗ وَسَعٰى فِيْ خَرَابِهَاۗ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ مَا كَانَ لَهُمْ اَنْ يَّدْخُلُوْهَآ اِلَّا خَاۤىِٕفِيْنَ ەۗ لَهُمْ فِى الدُّنْيَا خِزْيٌ وَّلَهُمْ فِى الْاٰخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa man aẓlamu mim mam mana‘a masājidallāhi ay yużkara fīhasmuhū wa sa‘ā fī kharābihā, ulā'ika mā kāna lahum ay yadkhulūhā illā khā'ifīn(a), lahum fid-dun-yā khizyuw wa lahum fil-ākhirati ‘ażābun ‘aẓīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And who are more unjust than those who prevent the name of Allāh from being mentioned [i.e., praised] in His mosques and strive toward their destruction. It is not for them to enter them except in fear. For them in this world is disgrace, and they will have in the Hereafter a great punishment.
ayat.teksInggris: And who are more unjust than those who prevent the name of Allāh from being mentioned [i.e., praised] in His mosques and strive toward their destruction. It is not for them to enter them except in fear. For them in this world is disgrace, and they will have in the Hereafter a great punishment.

ayat.teksArab: وَلِلّٰهِ الْمَشْرِقُ وَالْمَغْرِبُ  فَاَيْنَمَا تُوَلُّوْا فَثَمَّ وَجْهُ اللّٰهِ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ وَاسِعٌ عَلِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lillāhil-masyriqu wal-magrib(u), fa'ainamā tuwallū faṡamma wajhullāh(i), innallāha wāsi‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And to Allāh belongs the east and the west. So wherever you [might] turn, there is the Face<sup foot_note=195965>1</sup> of Allāh. Indeed, Allāh is all-Encompassing and Knowing.
ayat.teksInggris: And to Allāh belongs the east and the west. So wherever you [might] turn, there is the Face<sup foot_note=195965>1</sup> of Allāh. Indeed, Allāh is all-Encompassing and Knowing.

ayat.teksArab: وَقَالُوا اتَّخَذَ اللّٰهُ وَلَدًا ۙسُبْحٰنَهٗ ۗ بَلْ لَّهٗ مَا فِى السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِۗ  كُلٌّ لَّهٗ قٰنِتُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qāluttakhażallāhu waladan subḥānah(ū), bal lahū mā fis-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), kullul lahū qānitūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: They say, "Allāh has taken a son." Exalted is He!<sup foot_note=195966>1</sup> Rather, to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. All are devoutly obedient to Him,
ayat.teksInggris: They say, "Allāh has taken a son." Exalted is He!<sup foot_note=195966>1</sup> Rather, to Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. All are devoutly obedient to Him,

ayat.teksArab: بَدِيْعُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِۗ وَاِذَا قَضٰٓى اَمْرًا فَاِنَّمَا يَقُوْلُ لَهٗ كُنْ فَيَكُوْنُ
ayat.teksLatin: Badī‘us-samāwāti wal-arḍ(i), wa iżā qaḍā amran fa'innamā yaqūlu lahū kun fayakūn(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Originator of the heavens and the earth. When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.
ayat.teksInggris: Originator of the heavens and the earth. When He decrees a matter, He only says to it, "Be," and it is.

ayat.teksArab: وَقَالَ الَّذِيْنَ لَا يَعْلَمُوْنَ لَوْلَا يُكَلِّمُنَا اللّٰهُ اَوْ تَأْتِيْنَآ اٰيَةٌ  ۗ كَذٰلِكَ قَالَ الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ مِّثْلَ قَوْلِهِمْ ۗ تَشَابَهَتْ قُلُوْبُهُمْ ۗ قَدْ بَيَّنَّا الْاٰيٰتِ لِقَوْمٍ يُّوْقِنُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qālal-lażīna lā ya‘lamūna lau lā yukallimunallāhu au ta'tīnā āyah(tun), każālika qālal-lażīna min qablihim miṡla qaulihim, tasyābahat qulūbuhum, qad bayyannal-āyāti liqaumiy yūqinūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Those who do not know say, "Why does Allāh not speak to us or there come to us a sign?" Thus spoke those before them like their words. Their hearts resemble each other. We have shown clearly the signs to a people who are certain [in faith].
ayat.teksInggris: Those who do not know say, "Why does Allāh not speak to us or there come to us a sign?" Thus spoke those before them like their words. Their hearts resemble each other. We have shown clearly the signs to a people who are certain [in faith].

ayat.teksArab: اِنَّآ اَرْسَلْنٰكَ بِالْحَقِّ بَشِيْرًا وَّنَذِيْرًاۙ وَّلَا تُسْـَٔلُ عَنْ اَصْحٰبِ الْجَحِيْمِ
ayat.teksLatin: Innā arsalnāka bil-ḥaqqi basyīraw wa nażīrā(n), wa lā tus'alu ‘an aṣḥābil-jaḥīm(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Indeed, We have sent you, [O Muḥammad], with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner, and you will not be asked about the companions of Hellfire.
ayat.teksInggris: Indeed, We have sent you, [O Muḥammad], with the truth as a bringer of good tidings and a warner, and you will not be asked about the companions of Hellfire.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَنْ تَرْضٰى عَنْكَ الْيَهُوْدُ وَلَا النَّصٰرٰى حَتّٰى تَتَّبِعَ مِلَّتَهُمْ ۗ قُلْ اِنَّ هُدَى اللّٰهِ هُوَ الْهُدٰى ۗ وَلَىِٕنِ اتَّبَعْتَ اَهْوَاۤءَهُمْ بَعْدَ الَّذِيْ جَاۤءَكَ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ ۙ مَا لَكَ مِنَ اللّٰهِ مِنْ وَّلِيٍّ وَّلَا نَصِيْرٍ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lan tarḍā ‘ankal-yahūdu wa lan-naṣārā ḥattā tattabi‘a millatahum, qul inna hudallāhi huwal-hudā, wa la'inittaba‘ta ahwā'ahum ba‘dal-lażī jā'aka minal-‘ilm(i), mā laka minallāhi miw waliyyiw wa lā naṣīr(in).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And never will the Jews and the Christians approve of you until you follow their religion. Say, "Indeed, the guidance of Allāh is the [only] guidance." If you were to follow their desires after what has come to you of knowledge, you would have against Allāh no protector or helper.
ayat.teksInggris: And never will the Jews and the Christians approve of you until you follow their religion. Say, "Indeed, the guidance of Allāh is the [only] guidance." If you were to follow their desires after what has come to you of knowledge, you would have against Allāh no protector or helper.

ayat.teksArab: اَلَّذِيْنَ اٰتَيْنٰهُمُ الْكِتٰبَ يَتْلُوْنَهٗ حَقَّ تِلَاوَتِهٖۗ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ يُؤْمِنُوْنَ بِهٖ ۗ وَمَنْ يَّكْفُرْ بِهٖ فَاُولٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ الْخٰسِرُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Allażīna ātaināhumul-kitāba yatlūnahū ḥaqqa tilāwatih(ī), ulā'ika yu'minūna bih(ī), wa may yakfur bihī fa ulā'ika humul-khāsirūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Those to whom We have given the Book recite it with its true recital.<sup foot_note=195967>1</sup> They [are the ones who] believe in it. And whoever disbelieves in it - it is they who are the losers.
ayat.teksInggris: Those to whom We have given the Book recite it with its true recital.<sup foot_note=195967>1</sup> They [are the ones who] believe in it. And whoever disbelieves in it - it is they who are the losers.

ayat.teksArab: يٰبَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ اذْكُرُوْا نِعْمَتِيَ الَّتِيْٓ اَنْعَمْتُ عَلَيْكُمْ وَاَنِّيْ فَضَّلْتُكُمْ عَلَى الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā banī isrā'īlażkurū ni‘matiyal-latī an‘amtu ‘alaikum wa annī faḍḍaltukum ‘alal-‘ālamīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O Children of Israel, remember My favor which I have bestowed upon you and that I preferred you over the worlds.
ayat.teksInggris: O Children of Israel, remember My favor which I have bestowed upon you and that I preferred you over the worlds.

ayat.teksArab: وَاتَّقُوْا يَوْمًا لَّا تَجْزِيْ نَفْسٌ عَنْ نَّفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا وَّلَا يُقْبَلُ مِنْهَا عَدْلٌ وَّلَا تَنْفَعُهَا شَفَاعَةٌ وَّلَا هُمْ يُنْصَرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wattaqū yaumal lā tajzī nafsun ‘an nafsin syai'aw wa lā yuqbalu minhā ‘adluw wa lā tanfa‘uhā syafā‘atuw wa lā hum yunṣarūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And fear a Day when no soul will suffice for another soul<sup foot_note=195968>1</sup> at all, and no compensation will be accepted from it, nor will any intercession benefit it, nor will they be aided.
ayat.teksInggris: And fear a Day when no soul will suffice for another soul<sup foot_note=195968>1</sup> at all, and no compensation will be accepted from it, nor will any intercession benefit it, nor will they be aided.

ayat.teksArab: ۞ وَاِذِ ابْتَلٰٓى اِبْرٰهٖمَ رَبُّهٗ بِكَلِمٰتٍ فَاَتَمَّهُنَّ ۗ قَالَ اِنِّيْ جَاعِلُكَ لِلنَّاسِ اِمَامًا ۗ قَالَ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِيْ ۗ قَالَ لَا يَنَالُ عَهْدِى الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iżibtalā ibrāhīma rabbuhū bikalimātin fa atammahunn(a), qāla innī jā‘iluka lin-nāsi imāmā(n), qāla wa min żurriyyatī, qāla lā yanālu ‘ahdiẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [mention, O Muḥammad], when Abraham was tried by his Lord with words [i.e., commands] and he fulfilled them. [Allāh] said, "Indeed, I will make you a leader for the people." [Abraham] said, "And of my descendants?" [Allāh] said, "My covenant does not include the wrongdoers."
ayat.teksInggris: And [mention, O Muḥammad], when Abraham was tried by his Lord with words [i.e., commands] and he fulfilled them. [Allāh] said, "Indeed, I will make you a leader for the people." [Abraham] said, "And of my descendants?" [Allāh] said, "My covenant does not include the wrongdoers."

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ جَعَلْنَا الْبَيْتَ مَثَابَةً لِّلنَّاسِ وَاَمْنًاۗ وَاتَّخِذُوْا مِنْ مَّقَامِ اِبْرٰهٖمَ مُصَلًّىۗ  وَعَهِدْنَآ اِلٰٓى اِبْرٰهٖمَ وَاِسْمٰعِيْلَ اَنْ طَهِّرَا بَيْتِيَ لِلطَّاۤىِٕفِيْنَ وَالْعٰكِفِيْنَ وَالرُّكَّعِ السُّجُوْدِ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż ja‘alnal-baita maṡābatal lin-nāsi wa amnā(n), wattakhiżū mim maqāmi ibrāhīma muṣallā(n), wa ‘ahidnā ilā ibrāhīma wa ismā‘īla an ṭahhirā baitiya liṭ-ṭā'ifīna  wal-‘ākifīna war-rukka‘is-sujūd(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [mention] when We made the House [i.e., the Kaʿbah] a place of return for the people and [a place of] security. And take, [O believers], from the standing place of Abraham a place of prayer. And We charged Abraham and Ishmael, [saying], "Purify My House for those who perform ṭawāf<sup foot_note=195969>1</sup> and those who are staying [there] for worship and those who bow and prostrate [in prayer]."
ayat.teksInggris: And [mention] when We made the House [i.e., the Kaʿbah] a place of return for the people and [a place of] security. And take, [O believers], from the standing place of Abraham a place of prayer. And We charged Abraham and Ishmael, [saying], "Purify My House for those who perform ṭawāf<sup foot_note=195969>1</sup> and those who are staying [there] for worship and those who bow and prostrate [in prayer]."

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ قَالَ اِبْرٰهٖمُ رَبِّ اجْعَلْ هٰذَا بَلَدًا اٰمِنًا وَّارْزُقْ اَهْلَهٗ مِنَ الثَّمَرٰتِ مَنْ اٰمَنَ مِنْهُمْ بِاللّٰهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْاٰخِرِۗ قَالَ وَمَنْ كَفَرَ فَاُمَتِّعُهٗ قَلِيْلًا ثُمَّ اَضْطَرُّهٗٓ اِلٰى عَذَابِ النَّارِ ۗ وَبِئْسَ الْمَصِيْرُ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż qāla ibrāhīmu rabbij‘al hāżā baladan āminaw warzuq ahlahū minaṡ-ṡamarāti man āmana minhum billāhi wal-yaumil-ākhir(i), qāla wa man kafara fa umatti‘uhū qalīlan ṡumma aḍṭarruhū ilā ‘ażābin-nār(i), wa bi'sal-maṣīr(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [mention] when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this a secure city and provide its people with fruits - whoever of them believes in Allāh and the Last Day." [Allāh] said, "And whoever disbelieves - I will grant him enjoyment for a little; then I will force him to the punishment of the Fire, and wretched is the destination."
ayat.teksInggris: And [mention] when Abraham said, "My Lord, make this a secure city and provide its people with fruits - whoever of them believes in Allāh and the Last Day." [Allāh] said, "And whoever disbelieves - I will grant him enjoyment for a little; then I will force him to the punishment of the Fire, and wretched is the destination."

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذْ يَرْفَعُ اِبْرٰهٖمُ الْقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ الْبَيْتِ وَاِسْمٰعِيْلُۗ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا ۗ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ السَّمِيْعُ الْعَلِيْمُ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iż yarfa‘u ibrāhīmul-qawā‘ida minal-baiti wa ismā‘īl(u), rabbanā taqabbal minnā, innaka antas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [mention] when Abraham was raising the foundations of the House and [with him] Ishmael, [saying], "Our Lord, accept [this] from us. Indeed, You are the Hearing,<sup foot_note=195971>1</sup> the Knowing.<sup foot_note=195970>2</sup>
ayat.teksInggris: And [mention] when Abraham was raising the foundations of the House and [with him] Ishmael, [saying], "Our Lord, accept [this] from us. Indeed, You are the Hearing,<sup foot_note=195971>1</sup> the Knowing.<sup foot_note=195970>2</sup>

ayat.teksArab: رَبَّنَا وَاجْعَلْنَا مُسْلِمَيْنِ لَكَ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِنَآ اُمَّةً مُّسْلِمَةً لَّكَۖ وَاَرِنَا مَنَاسِكَنَا وَتُبْ عَلَيْنَا ۚ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيْمُ
ayat.teksLatin: Rabbanā waj‘alnā muslimaini laka wa min żurriyyatinā ummatam muslimatal lak(a), wa arinā manāsikanā wa tub ‘alainā, innaka antat-tawwābur-raḥīm(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Our Lord, and make us Muslims [in submission] to You and from our descendants a Muslim nation [in submission] to You. And show us our rites [of worship] and accept our repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepting of Repentance, the Merciful.
ayat.teksInggris: Our Lord, and make us Muslims [in submission] to You and from our descendants a Muslim nation [in submission] to You. And show us our rites [of worship] and accept our repentance. Indeed, You are the Accepting of Repentance, the Merciful.

ayat.teksArab: رَبَّنَا وَابْعَثْ فِيْهِمْ رَسُوْلًا مِّنْهُمْ يَتْلُوْا عَلَيْهِمْ اٰيٰتِكَ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ الْكِتٰبَ وَالْحِكْمَةَ وَيُزَكِّيْهِمْ ۗ اِنَّكَ اَنْتَ الْعَزِيْزُ الْحَكِيْمُ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Rabbanā  wab‘aṡ fīhim rasūlam minhum yatlū ‘alaihim āyātika wa yu‘allimuhumul-kitāba wal-ḥikmata wa yuzakkīhim, innaka antal-‘azīzul-ḥakīm(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Our Lord, and send among them a messenger from themselves who will recite to them Your verses and teach them the Book and wisdom and purify them. Indeed, You are the Exalted in Might,<sup foot_note=195972>1</sup> the Wise."
ayat.teksInggris: Our Lord, and send among them a messenger from themselves who will recite to them Your verses and teach them the Book and wisdom and purify them. Indeed, You are the Exalted in Might,<sup foot_note=195972>1</sup> the Wise."

ayat.teksArab: وَمَنْ يَّرْغَبُ عَنْ مِّلَّةِ اِبْرٰهٖمَ اِلَّا مَنْ سَفِهَ نَفْسَهٗ ۗوَلَقَدِ اصْطَفَيْنٰهُ فِى الدُّنْيَا ۚوَاِنَّهٗ فِى الْاٰخِرَةِ لَمِنَ الصّٰلِحِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa may yargabu ‘an millati ibrāhīma illā man safiha nafsah(ū), wa laqad-iṣṭafaināhu fid-dun-yā, wa innahū fil-ākhirati laminaṣ-ṣāliḥīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And who would be averse to the religion of Abraham except one who makes a fool of himself. And We had chosen him in this world, and indeed he, in the Hereafter, will be among the righteous.
ayat.teksInggris: And who would be averse to the religion of Abraham except one who makes a fool of himself. And We had chosen him in this world, and indeed he, in the Hereafter, will be among the righteous.

ayat.teksArab: اِذْ قَالَ لَهٗ رَبُّهٗٓ اَسْلِمْۙ  قَالَ اَسْلَمْتُ لِرَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Iż qāla lahū rabbuhū aslim, qāla aslamtu lirabbil-‘ālamīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: When his Lord said to him, "Submit," he said, "I have submitted [in Islām]<sup foot_note=195973>1</sup> to the Lord of the worlds."
ayat.teksInggris: When his Lord said to him, "Submit," he said, "I have submitted [in Islām]<sup foot_note=195973>1</sup> to the Lord of the worlds."

ayat.teksArab: وَوَصّٰى بِهَآ اِبْرٰهٖمُ بَنِيْهِ وَيَعْقُوْبُۗ يٰبَنِيَّ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ اصْطَفٰى لَكُمُ الدِّيْنَ فَلَا تَمُوْتُنَّ اِلَّا وَاَنْتُمْ مُّسْلِمُوْنَ ۗ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa waṣṣā bihā ibrāhīmu banīhi wa ya‘qūb(u), yā baniyya innallāhaṣṭafā lakumud-dīna falā tamūtunna illā wa antum muslimūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And Abraham instructed his sons [to do the same] and [so did] Jacob, [saying], "O my sons, indeed Allāh has chosen for you this religion, so do not die except while you are Muslims."
ayat.teksInggris: And Abraham instructed his sons [to do the same] and [so did] Jacob, [saying], "O my sons, indeed Allāh has chosen for you this religion, so do not die except while you are Muslims."

ayat.teksArab: اَمْ كُنْتُمْ شُهَدَاۤءَ اِذْ حَضَرَ يَعْقُوْبَ الْمَوْتُۙ اِذْ قَالَ لِبَنِيْهِ مَا تَعْبُدُوْنَ مِنْۢ بَعْدِيْۗ قَالُوْا نَعْبُدُ اِلٰهَكَ وَاِلٰهَ اٰبَاۤىِٕكَ اِبْرٰهٖمَ وَاِسْمٰعِيْلَ وَاِسْحٰقَ اِلٰهًا وَّاحِدًاۚ وَنَحْنُ لَهٗ مُسْلِمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Am kuntum syuhadā'a iż ḥaḍara ya‘qūbal-maut(u), iż qāla libanīhi mā ta‘budūna mim ba‘dī, qālū na‘budu ilāhaka wa ilāha ābā'ika ibrāhīma wa ismā‘īla wa isḥāqa ilāhaw wāḥidā(n), wa naḥnu lahū muslimūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Or were you witnesses when death approached Jacob, when he said to his sons, "What will you worship after me?" They said, "We will worship your God and the God of your fathers, Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac - one God.<sup foot_note=195974>1</sup> And we are Muslims [in submission] to Him."
ayat.teksInggris: Or were you witnesses when death approached Jacob, when he said to his sons, "What will you worship after me?" They said, "We will worship your God and the God of your fathers, Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac - one God.<sup foot_note=195974>1</sup> And we are Muslims [in submission] to Him."

ayat.teksArab: تِلْكَ اُمَّةٌ قَدْ خَلَتْ ۚ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَلَكُمْ مَّا كَسَبْتُمْ ۚ وَلَا تُسْـَٔلُوْنَ عَمَّا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Tilka ummatun qad khalat, lahā mā kasabat wa lakum mā kasabtum, wa lā tus'alūna ‘ammā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: That was a nation which has passed on. It will have [the consequence of] what it earned, and you will have what you have earned. And you will not be asked about what they used to do.
ayat.teksInggris: That was a nation which has passed on. It will have [the consequence of] what it earned, and you will have what you have earned. And you will not be asked about what they used to do.

ayat.teksArab: وَقَالُوْا كُوْنُوْا هُوْدًا اَوْ نَصٰرٰى تَهْتَدُوْا ۗ قُلْ بَلْ مِلَّةَ اِبْرٰهٖمَ حَنِيْفًا ۗوَمَا كَانَ مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qālū kūnū hūdan au naṣārā tahtadū, qul bal millata ibrāhīma ḥanīfā(n), wa mā kāna minal-musyrikīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: They say, "Be Jews or Christians [so] you will be guided." Say, "Rather, [we follow] the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth, and he was not of the polytheists."<sup foot_note=195975>1</sup>
ayat.teksInggris: They say, "Be Jews or Christians [so] you will be guided." Say, "Rather, [we follow] the religion of Abraham, inclining toward truth, and he was not of the polytheists."<sup foot_note=195975>1</sup>

ayat.teksArab: قُوْلُوْٓا اٰمَنَّا بِاللّٰهِ وَمَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلَيْنَا وَمَآ اُنْزِلَ اِلٰٓى اِبْرٰهٖمَ وَاِسْمٰعِيْلَ وَاِسْحٰقَ وَيَعْقُوْبَ وَالْاَسْبَاطِ وَمَآ اُوْتِيَ مُوْسٰى وَعِيْسٰى وَمَآ اُوْتِيَ النَّبِيُّوْنَ مِنْ رَّبِّهِمْۚ  لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيْنَ اَحَدٍ مِّنْهُمْۖ وَنَحْنُ لَهٗ مُسْلِمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Qūlū āmannā billāhi wa mā unzila ilainā wa mā unzila ilā ibrāhīma wa ismā‘īla wa isḥāqa  wa ya‘qūba wal-asbāṭi wa mā ūtiya mūsā wa ‘īsā wa mā ūtiyan-nabiyyūna mir rabbihim, lā nufarriqu baina aḥadim minhum wa naḥnu lahū muslimūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Say, [O believers], "We have believed in Allāh and what has been revealed to us and what has been revealed to Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac and Jacob and the Descendants [al-Asbāṭ]<sup foot_note=195976>1</sup> and what was given to Moses and Jesus and what was given to the prophets from their Lord. We make no distinction between any of them, and we are Muslims [in submission] to Him."
ayat.teksInggris: Say, [O believers], "We have believed in Allāh and what has been revealed to us and what has been revealed to Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac and Jacob and the Descendants [al-Asbāṭ]<sup foot_note=195976>1</sup> and what was given to Moses and Jesus and what was given to the prophets from their Lord. We make no distinction between any of them, and we are Muslims [in submission] to Him."

ayat.teksArab: فَاِنْ اٰمَنُوْا بِمِثْلِ مَآ اٰمَنْتُمْ بِهٖ فَقَدِ اهْتَدَوْا ۚوَاِنْ تَوَلَّوْا فَاِنَّمَا هُمْ فِيْ شِقَاقٍۚ فَسَيَكْفِيْكَهُمُ اللّٰهُ ۚوَهُوَ السَّمِيْعُ الْعَلِيْمُ ۗ
ayat.teksLatin: Fa'in āmanū bimiṡli mā āmantum bihī faqadihtadau, wa in tawallau fa'innamā hum fī syiqāq(in), fasayakfīkahumullāh(u), wa huwas-samī‘ul-‘alīm(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: So if they believe in the same as you believe in, then they have been [rightly] guided; but if they turn away, they are only in dissension, and Allāh will be sufficient for you against them. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
ayat.teksInggris: So if they believe in the same as you believe in, then they have been [rightly] guided; but if they turn away, they are only in dissension, and Allāh will be sufficient for you against them. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.

ayat.teksArab: صِبْغَةَ اللّٰهِ ۚ وَمَنْ اَحْسَنُ مِنَ اللّٰهِ صِبْغَةً ۖ وَّنَحْنُ لَهٗ عٰبِدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ṣibgatallāh(i), wa man aḥsanu minallāhi ṣibgataw wa naḥnu lahū ‘ābidūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: [And say, "Ours is] the religion of Allāh. And who is better than Allāh in [ordaining] religion? And we are worshippers of Him."
ayat.teksInggris: [And say, "Ours is] the religion of Allāh. And who is better than Allāh in [ordaining] religion? And we are worshippers of Him."

ayat.teksArab: قُلْ اَتُحَاۤجُّوْنَنَا فِى اللّٰهِ وَهُوَ رَبُّنَا وَرَبُّكُمْۚ وَلَنَآ اَعْمَالُنَا وَلَكُمْ اَعْمَالُكُمْۚ وَنَحْنُ لَهٗ مُخْلِصُوْنَ ۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Qul atuḥājjūnanā fillāhi wa huwa rabbunā wa rabbukum, wa lanā a‘mālunā wa lakum a‘mālukum, wa naḥnu lahū mukhliṣūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Say, [O Muḥammad], "Do you argue with us about Allāh while He is our Lord and your Lord? For us are our deeds, and for you are your deeds. And we are sincere [in deed and intention] to Him."
ayat.teksInggris: Say, [O Muḥammad], "Do you argue with us about Allāh while He is our Lord and your Lord? For us are our deeds, and for you are your deeds. And we are sincere [in deed and intention] to Him."

ayat.teksArab: اَمْ تَقُوْلُوْنَ اِنَّ اِبْرٰهٖمَ وَاِسْمٰعِيْلَ وَاِسْحٰقَ وَيَعْقُوْبَ وَالْاَسْبَاطَ كَانُوْا هُوْدًا اَوْ نَصٰرٰى ۗ قُلْ ءَاَنْتُمْ اَعْلَمُ اَمِ اللّٰهُ ۗ وَمَنْ اَظْلَمُ مِمَّنْ كَتَمَ شَهَادَةً عِنْدَهٗ مِنَ اللّٰهِ ۗ وَمَا اللّٰهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Am taqūlūna inna ibrāhīma wa ismā‘īla wa isḥāqa  wa ya‘qūba wal-asbāṭa kānū hūdan au naṣārā, qul a'antum a‘lamu amillāh(u), wa man aẓlamu mimman katama syahādatan ‘indahū minallāh(i), wa mallāhu bigāfilin ‘ammā ta‘malūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Or do you say that Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac and Jacob and the Descendants were Jews or Christians? Say, "Are you more knowing or is Allāh?" And who is more unjust than one who conceals a testimony<sup foot_note=195977>1</sup> he has from Allāh? And Allāh is not unaware of what you do.
ayat.teksInggris: Or do you say that Abraham and Ishmael and Isaac and Jacob and the Descendants were Jews or Christians? Say, "Are you more knowing or is Allāh?" And who is more unjust than one who conceals a testimony<sup foot_note=195977>1</sup> he has from Allāh? And Allāh is not unaware of what you do.

ayat.teksArab: تِلْكَ اُمَّةٌ قَدْ خَلَتْ ۚ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتْ وَلَكُمْ مَّا كَسَبْتُمْ ۚ وَلَا تُسْـَٔلُوْنَ عَمَّا كَانُوْا يَعْمَلُوْنَ ࣖ   ۔
ayat.teksLatin: Tilka ummatun qad khalat, lahā mā kasabat wa lakum mā kasabtum, wa lā tus'alūna ‘ammā kānū ya‘malūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: That is a nation which has passed on. It will have [the consequence of] what it earned, and you will have what you have earned. And you will not be asked about what they used to do.
ayat.teksInggris: That is a nation which has passed on. It will have [the consequence of] what it earned, and you will have what you have earned. And you will not be asked about what they used to do.

ayat.teksArab: ۞ سَيَقُوْلُ السُّفَهَاۤءُ مِنَ النَّاسِ مَا وَلّٰىهُمْ عَنْ قِبْلَتِهِمُ الَّتِيْ كَانُوْا عَلَيْهَا ۗ قُلْ لِّلّٰهِ الْمَشْرِقُ وَالْمَغْرِبُۗ يَهْدِيْ مَنْ يَّشَاۤءُ اِلٰى صِرَاطٍ مُّسْتَقِيْمٍ
ayat.teksLatin: Sayāqūlus-sufahā'u minan-nāsi mā wallāhum ‘an qiblatihimul-latī kānū ‘alaihā, qul lillāhil-masyriqu wal-magrib(u), yahdī may yasyā'u ilā ṣirāṭim mustaqīm(in).
ayat.teksIndonesia: The foolish among the people will say, "What has turned them away from their qiblah,<sup foot_note=195979>1</sup> which they used to face?"<sup foot_note=195978>2</sup> Say, "To Allāh belongs the east and the west. He guides whom He wills to a straight path."
ayat.teksInggris: The foolish among the people will say, "What has turned them away from their qiblah,<sup foot_note=195979>1</sup> which they used to face?"<sup foot_note=195978>2</sup> Say, "To Allāh belongs the east and the west. He guides whom He wills to a straight path."

ayat.teksArab: وَكَذٰلِكَ جَعَلْنٰكُمْ اُمَّةً وَّسَطًا لِّتَكُوْنُوْا شُهَدَاۤءَ عَلَى النَّاسِ وَيَكُوْنَ الرَّسُوْلُ عَلَيْكُمْ شَهِيْدًا ۗ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا الْقِبْلَةَ الَّتِيْ كُنْتَ عَلَيْهَآ اِلَّا لِنَعْلَمَ مَنْ يَّتَّبِعُ الرَّسُوْلَ مِمَّنْ يَّنْقَلِبُ عَلٰى عَقِبَيْهِۗ  وَاِنْ كَانَتْ لَكَبِيْرَةً اِلَّا عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ هَدَى اللّٰهُ  ۗوَمَا كَانَ اللّٰهُ لِيُضِيْعَ اِيْمَانَكُمْ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ بِالنَّاسِ لَرَءُوْفٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa każālika ja‘alnākum  ummataw wasaṭal litakūnū syuhadā'a ‘alan-nāsi wa yakūnar-rasūlu ‘alaikum syahīdā(n), wa mā ja‘alnal-qiblatal-latī kunta ‘alaihā illā lina‘lama may yattabi‘ur-rasūla mimmay yanqalibu ‘alā ‘aqibaih(i), wa in kānat lakabīratan illā ‘alal-lażīna hadallāh(u), wa mā kānallāhu liyuḍī‘a īmānakum, innallāha bin-nāsi lara'ūfur raḥīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And thus We have made you a median [i.e., just] community that you will be witnesses over the people and the Messenger will be a witness over you. And We did not make the qiblah which you used to face except that We might make evident who would follow the Messenger from who would turn back on his heels.<sup foot_note=195980>1</sup> And indeed, it is difficult except for those whom Allāh has guided. And never would Allāh have caused you to lose your faith [i.e., your previous prayers]. Indeed Allāh is, to the people, Kind and Merciful.
ayat.teksInggris: And thus We have made you a median [i.e., just] community that you will be witnesses over the people and the Messenger will be a witness over you. And We did not make the qiblah which you used to face except that We might make evident who would follow the Messenger from who would turn back on his heels.<sup foot_note=195980>1</sup> And indeed, it is difficult except for those whom Allāh has guided. And never would Allāh have caused you to lose your faith [i.e., your previous prayers]. Indeed Allāh is, to the people, Kind and Merciful.

ayat.teksArab: قَدْ نَرٰى تَقَلُّبَ وَجْهِكَ فِى السَّمَاۤءِۚ فَلَنُوَلِّيَنَّكَ قِبْلَةً تَرْضٰىهَا ۖ فَوَلِّ وَجْهَكَ شَطْرَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ ۗ وَحَيْثُ مَا كُنْتُمْ فَوَلُّوْا وُجُوْهَكُمْ شَطْرَهٗ ۗ وَاِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْكِتٰبَ لَيَعْلَمُوْنَ اَنَّهُ الْحَقُّ مِنْ رَّبِّهِمْ ۗ وَمَا اللّٰهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا يَعْمَلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Qad narā taqallubaka wajhika fis-samā'(i), fa lanuwalliyannaka qiblatan tarḍāhā, fawalli wajhaka syaṭral-masjidil-ḥarām(i), wa ḥaiṡumā kuntum fawallū wujūhakum syaṭrah(ū), wa innal-lażīna ūtul-kitāba laya‘lamūna annahul-ḥaqqu mir rabbihim, wa mallāhu bigāfilin ‘ammā ya‘malūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: We have certainly seen the turning of your face, [O Muḥammad], toward the heaven, and We will surely turn you to a qiblah with which you will be pleased. So turn your face [i.e., yourself] toward al-Masjid al-Ḥarām.<sup foot_note=195981>1</sup> And wherever you [believers] are, turn your faces [i.e., yourselves] toward it [in prayer]. Indeed, those who have been given the Scripture [i.e., the Jews and the Christians] well know that it is the truth from their Lord. And Allāh is not unaware of what they do.
ayat.teksInggris: We have certainly seen the turning of your face, [O Muḥammad], toward the heaven, and We will surely turn you to a qiblah with which you will be pleased. So turn your face [i.e., yourself] toward al-Masjid al-Ḥarām.<sup foot_note=195981>1</sup> And wherever you [believers] are, turn your faces [i.e., yourselves] toward it [in prayer]. Indeed, those who have been given the Scripture [i.e., the Jews and the Christians] well know that it is the truth from their Lord. And Allāh is not unaware of what they do.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَىِٕنْ اَتَيْتَ الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْكِتٰبَ بِكُلِّ اٰيَةٍ مَّا تَبِعُوْا قِبْلَتَكَ ۚ وَمَآ اَنْتَ بِتَابِعٍ قِبْلَتَهُمْ ۚ وَمَا بَعْضُهُمْ بِتَابِعٍ قِبْلَةَ بَعْضٍۗ وَلَىِٕنِ اتَّبَعْتَ اَهْوَاۤءَهُمْ مِّنْۢ بَعْدِ مَاجَاۤءَكَ مِنَ الْعِلْمِ ۙ اِنَّكَ اِذًا لَّمِنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ ۘ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa la'in ataital-lażīna ūtul-kitāba bikulli āyatim mā tabi‘ū qiblatak(a), wa mā anta bitābi‘in qiblatahum, wa mā ba‘ḍuhum bitābi‘in qiblata ba‘ḍ(in), wa la'inittaba‘ta ahwā'ahum mim ba‘di mā jā'aka minal-‘ilm(i), innaka iżal laminaẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And if you brought to those who were given the Scripture every sign, they would not follow your qiblah. Nor will you be a follower of their qiblah. Nor would they be followers of one another's qiblah. So if you were to follow their desires after what has come to you of knowledge, indeed, you would then be among the wrongdoers.
ayat.teksInggris: And if you brought to those who were given the Scripture every sign, they would not follow your qiblah. Nor will you be a follower of their qiblah. Nor would they be followers of one another's qiblah. So if you were to follow their desires after what has come to you of knowledge, indeed, you would then be among the wrongdoers.

ayat.teksArab: اَلَّذِيْنَ اٰتَيْنٰهُمُ الْكِتٰبَ يَعْرِفُوْنَهٗ كَمَا يَعْرِفُوْنَ اَبْنَاۤءَهُمْ ۗ وَاِنَّ فَرِيْقًا مِّنْهُمْ لَيَكْتُمُوْنَ الْحَقَّ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Allażīna ātaināhumul-kitāba ya‘rifūnahū kamā ya‘rifūna abnā'ahum, wa inna farīqam minhum layaktumūnal-ḥaqqa wa hum ya‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Those to whom We gave the Scripture know him [i.e., Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ)] as they know their own sons. But indeed, a party of them conceal the truth while they know [it].
ayat.teksInggris: Those to whom We gave the Scripture know him [i.e., Prophet Muḥammad (ﷺ)] as they know their own sons. But indeed, a party of them conceal the truth while they know [it].

ayat.teksArab: اَلْحَقُّ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُوْنَنَّ مِنَ الْمُمْتَرِيْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Al-ḥaqqu mir rabbika falā takūnanna minal-mumtarīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: The truth is from your Lord, so never be among the doubters.
ayat.teksInggris: The truth is from your Lord, so never be among the doubters.

ayat.teksArab: وَلِكُلٍّ وِّجْهَةٌ هُوَ مُوَلِّيْهَا فَاسْتَبِقُوا الْخَيْرٰتِۗ اَيْنَ مَا تَكُوْنُوْا يَأْتِ بِكُمُ اللّٰهُ جَمِيْعًا ۗاِنَّ اللّٰهَ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيْرٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa likulliw wijhatun huwa muwallīhā fastabiqul-khairāt(i), aina mā takūnū ya'ti bikumullāhu jamī‘ā(n), innallāha ‘alā kulli syai'in qadīr(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: For each [religious following] is a [prayer] direction toward which it faces. So race to [all that is] good. Wherever you may be, Allāh will bring you forth [for judgement] all together. Indeed, Allāh is over all things competent.
ayat.teksInggris: For each [religious following] is a [prayer] direction toward which it faces. So race to [all that is] good. Wherever you may be, Allāh will bring you forth [for judgement] all together. Indeed, Allāh is over all things competent.

ayat.teksArab: وَمِنْ حَيْثُ خَرَجْتَ فَوَلِّ وَجْهَكَ شَطْرَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ ۗ وَاِنَّهٗ لَلْحَقُّ مِنْ رَّبِّكَ ۗ وَمَا اللّٰهُ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa min ḥaiṡu kharajta fawalli wajhaka syaṭral-masjidil-ḥarām(i), wa innahū lal-ḥaqqu mir rabbik(a), wa mallāhu bigāfilin ‘ammā ta‘malūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: So from wherever you go out [for prayer, O Muḥammad], turn your face toward al-Masjid al-Ḥarām, and indeed, it is the truth from your Lord. And Allāh is not unaware of what you do.
ayat.teksInggris: So from wherever you go out [for prayer, O Muḥammad], turn your face toward al-Masjid al-Ḥarām, and indeed, it is the truth from your Lord. And Allāh is not unaware of what you do.

ayat.teksArab: وَمِنْ حَيْثُ خَرَجْتَ فَوَلِّ وَجْهَكَ شَطْرَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ ۗ وَحَيْثُ مَا كُنْتُمْ فَوَلُّوْا وُجُوْهَكُمْ شَطْرَهٗ ۙ لِئَلَّا يَكُوْنَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَيْكُمْ حُجَّةٌ اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا مِنْهُمْ فَلَا تَخْشَوْهُمْ وَاخْشَوْنِيْ وَلِاُتِمَّ نِعْمَتِيْ عَلَيْكُمْ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَهْتَدُوْنَۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa min ḥaiṡu kharajta fa walli wajhaka syaṭral-masjidil-ḥarām(i), wa ḥaiṡumā kuntum fawallū wujūhakum syaṭrah(ū), li'allā yakūna lin-nāsi ‘alaikum ḥujjatun illal-lażīna ẓalamū minhum, falā takhsyauhum wakhsyaunī, wa li'utimma ni‘matī  ‘alaikum wa la‘allakum tahtadūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And from wherever you go out [for prayer], turn your face toward al-Masjid al-Ḥarām. And wherever you [believers] may be, turn your faces toward it in order that the people will not have any argument against you, except for those of them who commit wrong; so fear them not but fear Me. And [it is] so I may complete My favor upon you and that you may be guided,
ayat.teksInggris: And from wherever you go out [for prayer], turn your face toward al-Masjid al-Ḥarām. And wherever you [believers] may be, turn your faces toward it in order that the people will not have any argument against you, except for those of them who commit wrong; so fear them not but fear Me. And [it is] so I may complete My favor upon you and that you may be guided,

ayat.teksArab: كَمَآ اَرْسَلْنَا فِيْكُمْ رَسُوْلًا مِّنْكُمْ يَتْلُوْا عَلَيْكُمْ اٰيٰتِنَا وَيُزَكِّيْكُمْ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ الْكِتٰبَ وَالْحِكْمَةَ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمْ مَّا لَمْ تَكُوْنُوْا تَعْلَمُوْنَۗ
ayat.teksLatin: Kamā arsalnā fīkum rasūlam minkum yatlū ‘alaikum āyātinā wa yuzakkīkum wa yu‘allimukumul-kitāba wal-ḥikmata wa yu‘allimukum mā lam takūnū ta‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Just as We have sent among you a messenger from yourselves reciting to you Our verses and purifying you and teaching you the Book and wisdom<sup foot_note=195982>1</sup> and teaching you that which you did not know.
ayat.teksInggris: Just as We have sent among you a messenger from yourselves reciting to you Our verses and purifying you and teaching you the Book and wisdom<sup foot_note=195982>1</sup> and teaching you that which you did not know.

ayat.teksArab: فَاذْكُرُوْنِيْٓ اَذْكُرْكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوْا لِيْ وَلَا تَكْفُرُوْنِ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Fażkurūnī ażkurkum wasykurū lī wa lā takfurūn(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.
ayat.teksInggris: So remember Me; I will remember you. And be grateful to Me and do not deny Me.

ayat.teksArab: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوا اسْتَعِيْنُوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلٰوةِ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ مَعَ الصّٰبِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanusta‘īnū biṣ-ṣabri waṣ-ṣalāh(ti), innallāha ma‘aṣ-ṣābirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allāh is with the patient.
ayat.teksInggris: O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allāh is with the patient.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَا تَقُوْلُوْا لِمَنْ يُّقْتَلُ فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ اَمْوَاتٌ ۗ بَلْ اَحْيَاۤءٌ وَّلٰكِنْ لَّا تَشْعُرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lā taqūlū limay yuqtalu fī sabīlillāhi amwāt(un), bal aḥyā'uw wa lākil lā tasy‘urūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And do not say about those who are killed in the way of Allāh, "They are dead." Rather, they are alive, but you perceive [it] not.
ayat.teksInggris: And do not say about those who are killed in the way of Allāh, "They are dead." Rather, they are alive, but you perceive [it] not.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ بِشَيْءٍ مِّنَ الْخَوْفِ وَالْجُوْعِ وَنَقْصٍ مِّنَ الْاَمْوَالِ وَالْاَنْفُسِ وَالثَّمَرٰتِۗ وَبَشِّرِ الصّٰبِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lanabluwannakum bisyai'im minal-khaufi wal-jū‘i wa naqaṣim minal-amwāli wal-anfusi waṡ-ṡamarāt(i), wa basysyiriṣ-ṣābirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits, but give good tidings to the patient,
ayat.teksInggris: And We will surely test you with something of fear and hunger and a loss of wealth and lives and fruits, but give good tidings to the patient,

ayat.teksArab: اَلَّذِيْنَ اِذَآ اَصَابَتْهُمْ مُّصِيْبَةٌ ۗ قَالُوْٓا اِنَّا لِلّٰهِ وَاِنَّآ اِلَيْهِ رٰجِعُوْنَۗ
ayat.teksLatin: Allażīna iżā aṣābathum muṣībah(tun), qālū innā lillāhi wa innā ilaihi rāji‘ūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Who, when disaster strikes them, say, "Indeed we belong to Allāh, and indeed to Him we will return."
ayat.teksInggris: Who, when disaster strikes them, say, "Indeed we belong to Allāh, and indeed to Him we will return."

ayat.teksArab: اُولٰۤىِٕكَ عَلَيْهِمْ صَلَوٰتٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّهِمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ  ۗوَاُولٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ الْمُهْتَدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ulā'ika ‘alaihim ṣalawātum mir rabbihim wa raḥmah(tun), wa ulā'ika humul-muhtadūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Those are the ones upon whom are blessings from their Lord and mercy. And it is those who are the [rightly] guided.
ayat.teksInggris: Those are the ones upon whom are blessings from their Lord and mercy. And it is those who are the [rightly] guided.

ayat.teksArab: ۞ اِنَّ الصَّفَا وَالْمَرْوَةَ مِنْ شَعَاۤىِٕرِ اللّٰهِ ۚ فَمَنْ حَجَّ الْبَيْتَ اَوِ اعْتَمَرَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْهِ اَنْ يَّطَّوَّفَ بِهِمَا ۗ وَمَنْ تَطَوَّعَ خَيْرًاۙ فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ شَاكِرٌ عَلِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Innaṣ-ṣafā wal-marwata min sya‘ā'irillāh(i), faman ḥajjal-baita awi‘tamara falā junāḥa ‘alaihi ay yaṭṭawwafa bihimā, wa man taṭawwa‘a khairan fa innallāha syākirun ‘alīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Indeed, aṣ-Ṣafā and al-Marwah are among the symbols<sup foot_note=195985>1</sup> of Allāh. So whoever makes ḥajj [pilgrimage] to the House or performs ʿumrah - there is no blame upon him for walking between them.<sup foot_note=195984>2</sup> And whoever volunteers good - then indeed, Allāh is Appreciative<sup foot_note=195983>3</sup> and Knowing.
ayat.teksInggris: Indeed, aṣ-Ṣafā and al-Marwah are among the symbols<sup foot_note=195985>1</sup> of Allāh. So whoever makes ḥajj [pilgrimage] to the House or performs ʿumrah - there is no blame upon him for walking between them.<sup foot_note=195984>2</sup> And whoever volunteers good - then indeed, Allāh is Appreciative<sup foot_note=195983>3</sup> and Knowing.

ayat.teksArab: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ يَكْتُمُوْنَ مَآ اَنْزَلْنَا مِنَ الْبَيِّنٰتِ وَالْهُدٰى مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا بَيَّنّٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ فِى الْكِتٰبِۙ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ يَلْعَنُهُمُ اللّٰهُ وَيَلْعَنُهُمُ اللّٰعِنُوْنَۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Innal-lażīna yaktumūna mā anzalnā minal-bayyināti wal-hudā mim ba‘di mā bayyannāhu lin-nāsi fil-kitāb(i), ulā'ika yal‘anuhumullāhu wa yal‘anuhumul-lā‘inūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Indeed, those who conceal what We sent down of clear proofs and guidance after We made it clear for the people in the Scripture - those are cursed by Allāh and cursed by those who curse,<sup foot_note=195986>1</sup>
ayat.teksInggris: Indeed, those who conceal what We sent down of clear proofs and guidance after We made it clear for the people in the Scripture - those are cursed by Allāh and cursed by those who curse,<sup foot_note=195986>1</sup>

ayat.teksArab: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ تَابُوْا وَاَصْلَحُوْا وَبَيَّنُوْا فَاُولٰۤىِٕكَ اَتُوْبُ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ وَاَنَا التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيْمُ
ayat.teksLatin: Illal-lażīna tābū wa aṣlaḥū wa bayyanū fa'ulā'ika atūbu ‘alaihim, wa anat-tawwābur-raḥīm(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Except for those who repent and correct themselves and make evident [what they concealed]. Those - I will accept their repentance, and I am the Accepting of Repentance,<sup foot_note=195987>1</sup> the Merciful.
ayat.teksInggris: Except for those who repent and correct themselves and make evident [what they concealed]. Those - I will accept their repentance, and I am the Accepting of Repentance,<sup foot_note=195987>1</sup> the Merciful.

ayat.teksArab: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا وَمَاتُوْا وَهُمْ كُفَّارٌ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ عَلَيْهِمْ لَعْنَةُ اللّٰهِ وَالْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةِ وَالنَّاسِ اَجْمَعِيْنَۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Innal-lażīna kafarū wa mātū wa hum kuffārun ulā'ika ‘alaihim la‘natullāhi wal-malā'ikati wan-nāsi ajma‘īn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Indeed, those who disbelieve and die while they are disbelievers - upon them will be the curse of Allāh and of the angels and the people, all together,
ayat.teksInggris: Indeed, those who disbelieve and die while they are disbelievers - upon them will be the curse of Allāh and of the angels and the people, all together,

ayat.teksArab: خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَا ۚ لَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنْهُمُ الْعَذَابُ وَلَا هُمْ يُنْظَرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Khālidīna fīhā, lā yukhaffafu ‘anhumul-‘ażābu wa lā hum yunẓarūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Abiding eternally therein. The punishment will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved.
ayat.teksInggris: Abiding eternally therein. The punishment will not be lightened for them, nor will they be reprieved.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِلٰهُكُمْ اِلٰهٌ وَّاحِدٌۚ  لَآاِلٰهَ اِلَّا هُوَ الرَّحْمٰنُ الرَّحِيْمُ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa ilāhukum ilāhuw wāḥid(un), lā ilāha illā huwar-raḥmānur-raḥīm(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And your god is one God. There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
ayat.teksInggris: And your god is one God. There is no deity [worthy of worship] except Him, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.

ayat.teksArab: اِنَّ فِيْ خَلْقِ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ وَاخْتِلَافِ الَّيْلِ وَالنَّهَارِ وَالْفُلْكِ الَّتِيْ تَجْرِيْ فِى الْبَحْرِ بِمَا يَنْفَعُ النَّاسَ وَمَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ مِنَ السَّمَاۤءِ مِنْ مَّاۤءٍ فَاَحْيَا بِهِ الْاَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا وَبَثَّ فِيْهَا مِنْ كُلِّ دَاۤبَّةٍ ۖ وَّتَصْرِيْفِ الرِّيٰحِ وَالسَّحَابِ الْمُسَخَّرِ بَيْنَ السَّمَاۤءِ وَالْاَرْضِ لَاٰيٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يَّعْقِلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Inna fī khalqis-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakhtilāfil-laili wan-nahāri wal-fulkil-latī tajrī fil-baḥri bimā yanfa‘un-nāsa wa mā anzalallāhu minas-samā'i mim mā'in fa aḥyā bihil-arḍa ba‘da mautihā wa baṡṡa fīhā min kulli dābbah(tin), wa taṣrīfir-riyāḥi was-saḥābil-musakhkhari bainas-samā'i wal-arḍi la'āyātil liqaumiy ya‘qilūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the alternation of the night and the day, and the [great] ships which sail through the sea with that which benefits people, and what Allāh has sent down from the heavens of rain, giving life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and dispersing therein every [kind of] moving creature, and [His] directing of the winds and the clouds controlled between the heaven and earth are signs for a people who use reason.
ayat.teksInggris: Indeed, in the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the alternation of the night and the day, and the [great] ships which sail through the sea with that which benefits people, and what Allāh has sent down from the heavens of rain, giving life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness and dispersing therein every [kind of] moving creature, and [His] directing of the winds and the clouds controlled between the heaven and earth are signs for a people who use reason.

ayat.teksArab: وَمِنَ النَّاسِ مَنْ يَّتَّخِذُ مِنْ دُوْنِ اللّٰهِ اَنْدَادًا يُّحِبُّوْنَهُمْ كَحُبِّ اللّٰهِ ۗ وَالَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْٓا اَشَدُّ حُبًّا لِّلّٰهِ ۙوَلَوْ يَرَى الَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْٓا اِذْ يَرَوْنَ الْعَذَابَۙ اَنَّ الْقُوَّةَ لِلّٰهِ جَمِيْعًا ۙوَّاَنَّ اللّٰهَ شَدِيْدُ الْعَذَابِ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa minan-nāsi may yattakhiżu min dūnillāhi andāday yuḥibbūnahum kaḥubbillāh(i), wal-lażīna āmanū asyaddu ḥubbal lillāh(i), wa lau yaral-lażīna ẓalamū iż yaraunal-‘ażāb(a), annal-quwwata lillāhi jamī‘ā(n), wa annallāha syadīdul-‘ażāb(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And [yet], among the people are those who take other than Allāh as equals [to Him]. They love them as they [should] love Allāh. But those who believe are stronger in love for Allāh. And if only they who have wronged would consider [that] when they see the punishment, [they will be certain] that all power belongs to Allāh and that Allāh is severe in punishment.
ayat.teksInggris: And [yet], among the people are those who take other than Allāh as equals [to Him]. They love them as they [should] love Allāh. But those who believe are stronger in love for Allāh. And if only they who have wronged would consider [that] when they see the punishment, [they will be certain] that all power belongs to Allāh and that Allāh is severe in punishment.

ayat.teksArab: اِذْ تَبَرَّاَ الَّذِيْنَ اتُّبِعُوْا مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ اتَّبَعُوْا وَرَاَوُا الْعَذَابَ وَتَقَطَّعَتْ بِهِمُ الْاَسْبَابُ
ayat.teksLatin: Iż tabarra'al-lażīnattubi‘ū minal-lażīnattaba‘ū wa ra'awul-‘ażāba wa taqaṭṭa‘at bihimul-asbāb(u).
ayat.teksIndonesia: [And they should consider that] when those who have been followed disassociate themselves from those who followed [them], and they [all] see the punishment, and cut off from them are the ties [of relationship],
ayat.teksInggris: [And they should consider that] when those who have been followed disassociate themselves from those who followed [them], and they [all] see the punishment, and cut off from them are the ties [of relationship],

ayat.teksArab: وَقَالَ الَّذِيْنَ اتَّبَعُوْا لَوْ اَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَتَبَرَّاَ مِنْهُمْ ۗ كَمَا تَبَرَّءُوْا مِنَّا ۗ كَذٰلِكَ يُرِيْهِمُ اللّٰهُ اَعْمَالَهُمْ حَسَرٰتٍ عَلَيْهِمْ ۗ وَمَا هُمْ بِخٰرِجِيْنَ مِنَ النَّارِ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qālal-lażīnattaba‘ū lau anna lanā karratan fa natabarra'a minhum, kamā tabarra'ū minnā, każālika yurīhimullāhu a‘mālahum ḥasarātin ‘alaihim, wa mā hum bikhārijīna minan-nār(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Those who followed will say, "If only we had another turn [at worldly life] so we could disassociate ourselves from them as they have disassociated themselves from us." Thus will Allāh show them their deeds as regrets upon them. And they are never to emerge from the Fire.
ayat.teksInggris: Those who followed will say, "If only we had another turn [at worldly life] so we could disassociate ourselves from them as they have disassociated themselves from us." Thus will Allāh show them their deeds as regrets upon them. And they are never to emerge from the Fire.

ayat.teksArab: يٰٓاَيُّهَا النَّاسُ كُلُوْا مِمَّا فِى الْاَرْضِ حَلٰلًا طَيِّبًا ۖوَّلَا تَتَّبِعُوْا خُطُوٰتِ الشَّيْطٰنِۗ اِنَّهٗ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِيْنٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā ayyuhan-nāsu kulū mimmā fil-arḍi ḥalālan ṭayyibā(n), wa lā tattabi‘ū khuṭuwātisy-syaiṭān(i), innahū lakum ‘aduwwum mubīn(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O mankind, eat from whatever is on earth [that is] lawful and good and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.
ayat.teksInggris: O mankind, eat from whatever is on earth [that is] lawful and good and do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.

ayat.teksArab: اِنَّمَا يَأْمُرُكُمْ بِالسُّوْۤءِ وَالْفَحْشَاۤءِ وَاَنْ تَقُوْلُوْا عَلَى اللّٰهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Innamā ya'murukum bis-sū'i wal-faḥsyā'i wa an taqūlū ‘alallāhi mā lā ta‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: He only orders you to evil and immorality and to say about Allāh what you do not know.
ayat.teksInggris: He only orders you to evil and immorality and to say about Allāh what you do not know.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذَا قِيْلَ لَهُمُ اتَّبِعُوْا مَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ قَالُوْا بَلْ نَتَّبِعُ مَآ اَلْفَيْنَا عَلَيْهِ اٰبَاۤءَنَا ۗ اَوَلَوْ كَانَ اٰبَاۤؤُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُوْنَ شَيْـًٔا وَّلَا يَهْتَدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iżā qīla lahumuttabi‘ū mā anzalallāhu qālū bal nattabi‘u mā alfainā ‘alaihi ābā'anā, awalau kāna ābā'uhum lā ya‘qilūna syai'aw wa lā yahtadūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And when it is said to them, "Follow what Allāh has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that which we found our fathers doing." Even though their fathers understood nothing, nor were they guided?
ayat.teksInggris: And when it is said to them, "Follow what Allāh has revealed," they say, "Rather, we will follow that which we found our fathers doing." Even though their fathers understood nothing, nor were they guided?

ayat.teksArab: وَمَثَلُ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا كَمَثَلِ الَّذِيْ يَنْعِقُ بِمَا لَا يَسْمَعُ اِلَّا دُعَاۤءً وَّنِدَاۤءً ۗ صُمٌّ ۢ بُكْمٌ عُمْيٌ فَهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa maṡalul-lażīna kafarū kamaṡalil-lażī yan‘iqu bimā lā yasma‘u illā du‘ā'aw wa nidā'ā(n), ṣummum bukmun ‘umyun fahum lā ya‘qilūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: The example of those who disbelieve is like that of one who shouts at what hears nothing but calls and cries [i.e., cattle or sheep] - deaf, dumb and blind, so they do not understand.
ayat.teksInggris: The example of those who disbelieve is like that of one who shouts at what hears nothing but calls and cries [i.e., cattle or sheep] - deaf, dumb and blind, so they do not understand.

ayat.teksArab: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا كُلُوْا مِنْ طَيِّبٰتِ مَا رَزَقْنٰكُمْ وَاشْكُرُوْا لِلّٰهِ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ اِيَّاهُ تَعْبُدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū kulū min ṭayyibāti mā razaqnākum wasykurū lillāhi in kuntum iyyāhu ta‘budūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O you who have believed, eat from the good [i.e., lawful] things which We have provided for you and be grateful to Allāh if it is [indeed] Him that you worship.
ayat.teksInggris: O you who have believed, eat from the good [i.e., lawful] things which We have provided for you and be grateful to Allāh if it is [indeed] Him that you worship.

ayat.teksArab: اِنَّمَا حَرَّمَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْمَيْتَةَ وَالدَّمَ وَلَحْمَ الْخِنْزِيْرِ وَمَآ اُهِلَّ بِهٖ لِغَيْرِ اللّٰهِ ۚ فَمَنِ اضْطُرَّ غَيْرَ بَاغٍ وَّلَا عَادٍ فَلَآ اِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Innamā ḥarrama ‘alaikumul-maitata wad-dama wa laḥmal-khinzīri wa mā uhilla bihī ligairillāh(i), fa maniḍṭurra gaira bāgiw wa lā ‘ādin falā iṡma ‘alaih(i), innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: He has only forbidden to you dead animals,<sup foot_note=195988>1</sup> blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allāh. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit], there is no sin upon him. Indeed, Allāh is Forgiving and Merciful.
ayat.teksInggris: He has only forbidden to you dead animals,<sup foot_note=195988>1</sup> blood, the flesh of swine, and that which has been dedicated to other than Allāh. But whoever is forced [by necessity], neither desiring [it] nor transgressing [its limit], there is no sin upon him. Indeed, Allāh is Forgiving and Merciful.

ayat.teksArab: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ يَكْتُمُوْنَ مَآ اَنْزَلَ اللّٰهُ مِنَ الْكِتٰبِ وَيَشْتَرُوْنَ بِهٖ ثَمَنًا قَلِيْلًاۙ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ مَا يَأْكُلُوْنَ فِيْ بُطُوْنِهِمْ اِلَّا النَّارَ وَلَا يُكَلِّمُهُمُ اللّٰهُ يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ وَلَا يُزَكِّيْهِمْ ۚوَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Innal-lażīna yaktumūna mā anzalallāhu minal-kitābi wa yasytarūna bihī ṡamanan qalīlā(n), ulā'ika mā ya'kulūna fī buṭūnihim illan-nāra wa lā yukallimuhumullāhu yaumal-qiyāmati wa lā yuzakkīhim, wa lahum ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Indeed, they who conceal what Allāh has sent down of the Book and exchange it for a small price - those consume not into their bellies except the Fire. And Allāh will not speak to them on the Day of Resurrection, nor will He purify them. And they will have a painful punishment.
ayat.teksInggris: Indeed, they who conceal what Allāh has sent down of the Book and exchange it for a small price - those consume not into their bellies except the Fire. And Allāh will not speak to them on the Day of Resurrection, nor will He purify them. And they will have a painful punishment.

ayat.teksArab: اُولٰۤىِٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ اشْتَرَوُا الضَّلٰلَةَ بِالْهُدٰى وَالْعَذَابَ بِالْمَغْفِرَةِ ۚ فَمَآ اَصْبَرَهُمْ عَلَى النَّارِ
ayat.teksLatin: Ulā'ikal-lażīnasytarawuḍ-ḍalālata bil-hudā wal-‘ażāba bil-magfirah(ti), famā aṣbarahum ‘alan-nār(i).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Those are the ones who have exchanged guidance for error and forgiveness for punishment. How patient they are for [i.e., in pursuit of] the Fire!
ayat.teksInggris: Those are the ones who have exchanged guidance for error and forgiveness for punishment. How patient they are for [i.e., in pursuit of] the Fire!

ayat.teksArab: ذٰلِكَ بِاَنَّ اللّٰهَ نَزَّلَ الْكِتٰبَ بِالْحَقِّ ۗ وَاِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اخْتَلَفُوْا فِى الْكِتٰبِ لَفِيْ شِقَاقٍۢ بَعِيْدٍ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Żālika bi'annallāha nazzalal-kitāba bil-ḥaqq(i), wa innal-lażīnakhtalafū fil-kitābi lafī syiqāqim ba‘īd(in).
ayat.teksIndonesia: That is [deserved by them] because Allāh has sent down the Book in truth. And indeed, those who differ over the Book are in extreme dissension.
ayat.teksInggris: That is [deserved by them] because Allāh has sent down the Book in truth. And indeed, those who differ over the Book are in extreme dissension.

ayat.teksArab: ۞ لَيْسَ الْبِرَّاَنْ تُوَلُّوْا وُجُوْهَكُمْ قِبَلَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَلٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنْ اٰمَنَ بِاللّٰهِ وَالْيَوْمِ الْاٰخِرِ وَالْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةِ وَالْكِتٰبِ وَالنَّبِيّٖنَ ۚ وَاٰتَى الْمَالَ عَلٰى حُبِّهٖ ذَوِى الْقُرْبٰى وَالْيَتٰمٰى وَالْمَسٰكِيْنَ وَابْنَ السَّبِيْلِۙ وَالسَّاۤىِٕلِيْنَ وَفىِ الرِّقَابِۚ وَاَقَامَ الصَّلٰوةَ وَاٰتَى الزَّكٰوةَ ۚ وَالْمُوْفُوْنَ بِعَهْدِهِمْ اِذَا عَاهَدُوْا ۚ وَالصّٰبِرِيْنَ فِى الْبَأْسَاۤءِ وَالضَّرَّاۤءِ وَحِيْنَ الْبَأْسِۗ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ الَّذِيْنَ صَدَقُوْا ۗوَاُولٰۤىِٕكَ هُمُ الْمُتَّقُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Laisal-birra an tuwallū wujūhakum qibalal-masyriqi wal-magribi wa lākinnal-birra man āmana billāhi wal-yaumil ākhiri wal-malā'ikati wal-kitābi wan-nabiyyīn(a), wa ātal-māla ‘alā ḥubbihī żawil-qurbā wal-yatāmā wal-masākīna wabnas-sabīl(i), was-sā'ilīna wa fir-riqāb(i), wa aqāmaṣ-ṣalāta wa ātaz-zakāh(ta), wal mūfūna bi‘ahdihim iżā ‘āhadū, waṣ-ṣābirīna fil-ba'sā'i waḍ-ḍarrā'i wa ḥīnal-ba's(i), ulā'ikal-lażīna ṣadaqū, wa ulā'ika humul-muttaqūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Righteousness is not that you turn your faces toward the east or the west, but [true] righteousness is [in] one who believes in Allāh, the Last Day, the angels, the Book, and the prophets and gives wealth, in spite of love for it, to relatives, orphans, the needy, the traveler, those who ask [for help], and for freeing slaves; [and who] establishes prayer and gives zakāh; [those who] fulfill their promise when they promise; and [those who] are patient in poverty and hardship and during battle. Those are the ones who have been true, and it is those who are the righteous.
ayat.teksInggris: Righteousness is not that you turn your faces toward the east or the west, but [true] righteousness is [in] one who believes in Allāh, the Last Day, the angels, the Book, and the prophets and gives wealth, in spite of love for it, to relatives, orphans, the needy, the traveler, those who ask [for help], and for freeing slaves; [and who] establishes prayer and gives zakāh; [those who] fulfill their promise when they promise; and [those who] are patient in poverty and hardship and during battle. Those are the ones who have been true, and it is those who are the righteous.

ayat.teksArab: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الْقِصَاصُ فِى الْقَتْلٰىۗ اَلْحُرُّ بِالْحُرِّ وَالْعَبْدُ بِالْعَبْدِ وَالْاُنْثٰى بِالْاُنْثٰىۗ فَمَنْ عُفِيَ لَهٗ مِنْ اَخِيْهِ شَيْءٌ فَاتِّبَاعٌ ۢبِالْمَعْرُوْفِ وَاَدَاۤءٌ اِلَيْهِ بِاِحْسَانٍ ۗ ذٰلِكَ تَخْفِيْفٌ مِّنْ رَّبِّكُمْ وَرَحْمَةٌ  ۗفَمَنِ اعْتَدٰى بَعْدَ ذٰلِكَ فَلَهٗ عَذَابٌ اَلِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū kutiba ‘alaikumul-qiṣāṣu fil-qatlā, al-ḥurru bil-ḥurri wal-‘abdu bil-‘abdi wal-unṡā bil-unṡā, faman ‘ufiya lahū min akhīhi syai'un fattibā‘um bil-ma‘rūfi wa adā'un ilaihi bi iḥsān(in), żālika takhfīfum mir rabbikum wa raḥmah(tun), fa mani‘tadā ba‘da żālika fa lahū ‘ażābun alīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O you who have believed, prescribed for you is legal retribution for those murdered - the free for the free, the slave for the slave, and the female for the female.<sup foot_note=195991>1</sup> But whoever overlooks from his brother [i.e., the killer] anything,<sup foot_note=195990>2</sup> then there should be a suitable follow-up and payment to him [i.e., the deceased's heir or legal representative] with good conduct. This is an alleviation from your Lord and a mercy. But whoever transgresses after that<sup foot_note=195989>3</sup> will have a painful punishment.
ayat.teksInggris: O you who have believed, prescribed for you is legal retribution for those murdered - the free for the free, the slave for the slave, and the female for the female.<sup foot_note=195991>1</sup> But whoever overlooks from his brother [i.e., the killer] anything,<sup foot_note=195990>2</sup> then there should be a suitable follow-up and payment to him [i.e., the deceased's heir or legal representative] with good conduct. This is an alleviation from your Lord and a mercy. But whoever transgresses after that<sup foot_note=195989>3</sup> will have a painful punishment.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَكُمْ فِى الْقِصَاصِ حَيٰوةٌ يّٰٓاُولِى الْاَلْبَابِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lakum fil-qiṣāṣi ḥayātuy yā ulil-albābi la‘allakum tattaqūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And there is for you in legal retribution [saving of] life, O you [people] of understanding, that you may become righteous.<sup foot_note=195992>1</sup>
ayat.teksInggris: And there is for you in legal retribution [saving of] life, O you [people] of understanding, that you may become righteous.<sup foot_note=195992>1</sup>

ayat.teksArab: كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمْ اِذَا حَضَرَ اَحَدَكُمُ الْمَوْتُ اِنْ تَرَكَ خَيْرًا ۖ ۨالْوَصِيَّةُ لِلْوَالِدَيْنِ وَالْاَقْرَبِيْنَ بِالْمَعْرُوْفِۚ حَقًّا عَلَى الْمُتَّقِيْنَ ۗ
ayat.teksLatin: Kutiba ‘alaikum iżā ḥaḍara aḥadakumul-mautu in taraka kahirā(n), al-waṣiyyatu lil-wālidaini wal-aqrabīna bil-ma‘rūf(i), ḥaqqan ‘alal-muttaqīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Prescribed for you when death approaches [any] one of you if he leaves wealth [is that he should make] a bequest for the parents and near relatives according to what is acceptable - a duty upon the righteous.<sup foot_note=195993>1</sup>
ayat.teksInggris: Prescribed for you when death approaches [any] one of you if he leaves wealth [is that he should make] a bequest for the parents and near relatives according to what is acceptable - a duty upon the righteous.<sup foot_note=195993>1</sup>

ayat.teksArab: فَمَنْۢ بَدَّلَهٗ بَعْدَمَا سَمِعَهٗ فَاِنَّمَآ اِثْمُهٗ عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ يُبَدِّلُوْنَهٗ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ سَمِيْعٌ عَلِيْمٌ ۗ
ayat.teksLatin: Famam baddalahū ba‘da mā sami‘ahū fa innamā iṡmuhū ‘alal-lażīna yubaddilūnah(ū), innallāha samī‘un ‘alīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Then whoever alters it [i.e., the bequest] after he has heard it - the sin is only upon those who have altered it. Indeed, Allāh is Hearing and Knowing.
ayat.teksInggris: Then whoever alters it [i.e., the bequest] after he has heard it - the sin is only upon those who have altered it. Indeed, Allāh is Hearing and Knowing.

ayat.teksArab: فَمَنْ خَافَ مِنْ مُّوْصٍ جَنَفًا اَوْ اِثْمًا فَاَصْلَحَ بَيْنَهُمْ فَلَآ اِثْمَ عَلَيْهِ ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Faman khāfa mim mūṣin janafan au iṡman fa aṣlaḥa bainahum falā iṡma ‘alaih(i), innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: But if one fears from the bequeather [some] error or sin and corrects that which is between them [i.e., the concerned parties], there is no sin upon him. Indeed, Allāh is Forgiving and Merciful.
ayat.teksInggris: But if one fears from the bequeather [some] error or sin and corrects that which is between them [i.e., the concerned parties], there is no sin upon him. Indeed, Allāh is Forgiving and Merciful.

ayat.teksArab: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا كُتِبَ عَلَيْكُمُ الصِّيَامُ كَمَا كُتِبَ عَلَى الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَتَّقُوْنَۙ
ayat.teksLatin: Yā ayyuhal-lażīna āmanū kutiba ‘alaikumuṣ-ṣiyāmu kamā kutiba ‘alal-lażīna min qablikum la‘allakum tattaqūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: O you who have believed, decreed upon you is fasting as it was decreed upon those before you that you may become righteous -
ayat.teksInggris: O you who have believed, decreed upon you is fasting as it was decreed upon those before you that you may become righteous -

ayat.teksArab: اَيَّامًا مَّعْدُوْدٰتٍۗ فَمَنْ كَانَ مِنْكُمْ مَّرِيْضًا اَوْ عَلٰى سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِّنْ اَيَّامٍ اُخَرَ ۗوَعَلَى الَّذِيْنَ يُطِيْقُوْنَهٗ فِدْيَةٌ طَعَامُ مِسْكِيْنٍۗ فَمَنْ تَطَوَّعَ خَيْرًا فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّهٗ ۗوَاَنْ تَصُوْمُوْا خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ اِنْ كُنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Ayyāmam ma‘dūdāt(in), faman kāna minkum marīḍan au ‘alā safarin fa ‘iddatum min ayyāmin ukhar(a), wa ‘alal-lażīna yuṭīqūnahū fidyatun ṭa‘āmu miskīn(in), faman taṭawwa‘a khairan fahuwa khairul lah(ū), wa an taṣūmū khairul lakum in kuntum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: [Fasting for] a limited number of days. So whoever among you is ill or on a journey [during them] - then an equal number of other days [are to be made up]. And upon those who are able [to fast, but with hardship] - a ransom [as substitute] of feeding a poor person [each day]. And whoever volunteers good [i.e., excess] - it is better for him. But to fast is best for you, if you only knew.
ayat.teksInggris: [Fasting for] a limited number of days. So whoever among you is ill or on a journey [during them] - then an equal number of other days [are to be made up]. And upon those who are able [to fast, but with hardship] - a ransom [as substitute] of feeding a poor person [each day]. And whoever volunteers good [i.e., excess] - it is better for him. But to fast is best for you, if you only knew.

ayat.teksArab: شَهْرُ رَمَضَانَ الَّذِيْٓ اُنْزِلَ فِيْهِ الْقُرْاٰنُ هُدًى لِّلنَّاسِ وَبَيِّنٰتٍ مِّنَ الْهُدٰى وَالْفُرْقَانِۚ فَمَنْ شَهِدَ مِنْكُمُ الشَّهْرَ فَلْيَصُمْهُ ۗوَمَنْ كَانَ مَرِيْضًا اَوْ عَلٰى سَفَرٍ فَعِدَّةٌ مِّنْ اَيَّامٍ اُخَرَ ۗيُرِيْدُ اللّٰهُ بِكُمُ الْيُسْرَ وَلَا يُرِيْدُ بِكُمُ الْعُسْرَ ۖوَلِتُكْمِلُوا الْعِدَّةَ وَلِتُكَبِّرُوا اللّٰهَ عَلٰى مَا هَدٰىكُمْ وَلَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Syahru ramaḍānal-lażī unzila fīhil-qur'ānu hudal lin-nāsi wa bayyinātim minal-hudā wal-furqān(i), faman syahida minkumusy-syahra falyaṣumh(u) wa man kāna marīḍan au ‘alā safarin fa ‘iddatum min ayyāmin ukhar(a), yurīdullāhu bikumul-yusra wa lā yurīdu bikumul-‘usr(a), wa litukmilul-‘iddata wa litukabbirullāha ‘alā mā hadākum wa la‘allakum tasykurūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: The month of Ramaḍān [is that] in which was revealed the Qur’ān, a guidance for the people and clear proofs of guidance and criterion. So whoever sights [the crescent of] the month,<sup foot_note=195994>1</sup> let him fast it; and whoever is ill or on a journey - then an equal number of other days. Allāh intends for you ease and does not intend for you hardship and [wants] for you to complete the period and to glorify Allāh for that [to] which He has guided you; and perhaps you will be grateful.
ayat.teksInggris: The month of Ramaḍān [is that] in which was revealed the Qur’ān, a guidance for the people and clear proofs of guidance and criterion. So whoever sights [the crescent of] the month,<sup foot_note=195994>1</sup> let him fast it; and whoever is ill or on a journey - then an equal number of other days. Allāh intends for you ease and does not intend for you hardship and [wants] for you to complete the period and to glorify Allāh for that [to] which He has guided you; and perhaps you will be grateful.

ayat.teksArab: وَاِذَا سَاَلَكَ عِبَادِيْ عَنِّيْ فَاِنِّيْ قَرِيْبٌ ۗ اُجِيْبُ دَعْوَةَ الدَّاعِ اِذَا دَعَانِۙ فَلْيَسْتَجِيْبُوْا لِيْ وَلْيُؤْمِنُوْا بِيْ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْشُدُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa iżā sa'alaka ‘ibādī ‘annī fa innī qarīb(un),  ujību da‘watad-dā‘i iżā da‘ān(i), falyastajībū lī walyu'minū bī la‘allahum yarsyudūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And when My servants ask you, [O Muḥammad], concerning Me - indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me. So let them respond to Me [by obedience] and believe in Me that they may be [rightly] guided.
ayat.teksInggris: And when My servants ask you, [O Muḥammad], concerning Me - indeed I am near. I respond to the invocation of the supplicant when he calls upon Me. So let them respond to Me [by obedience] and believe in Me that they may be [rightly] guided.

ayat.teksArab: اُحِلَّ لَكُمْ لَيْلَةَ الصِّيَامِ الرَّفَثُ اِلٰى نِسَاۤىِٕكُمْ ۗ هُنَّ لِبَاسٌ لَّكُمْ وَاَنْتُمْ لِبَاسٌ لَّهُنَّ ۗ عَلِمَ اللّٰهُ اَنَّكُمْ كُنْتُمْ تَخْتَانُوْنَ اَنْفُسَكُمْ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَعَفَا عَنْكُمْ ۚ فَالْـٰٔنَ بَاشِرُوْهُنَّ وَابْتَغُوْا مَا كَتَبَ اللّٰهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَكُلُوْا وَاشْرَبُوْا حَتّٰى يَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمُ الْخَيْطُ الْاَبْيَضُ مِنَ الْخَيْطِ الْاَسْوَدِ مِنَ الْفَجْرِۖ  ثُمَّ اَتِمُّوا الصِّيَامَ اِلَى الَّيْلِۚ وَلَا تُبَاشِرُوْهُنَّ وَاَنْتُمْ عٰكِفُوْنَۙ فِى الْمَسٰجِدِ ۗ تِلْكَ حُدُوْدُ اللّٰهِ فَلَا تَقْرَبُوْهَاۗ  كَذٰلِكَ يُبَيِّنُ اللّٰهُ اٰيٰتِهٖ لِلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Uḥilla lakum lailataṣ-ṣiyāmir-rafaṡu ilā nisā'ikum, hunna libāsul lakum wa antum libāsul lahunn(a), ‘alimallāhu annakum kuntum takhtānūna anfusakum fatāba ‘alaikum wa ‘afā ‘ankum, fal-āna bāsyirūhunna wabtagū mā kataballāhu lakum, wa kulū wasyrabū ḥattā yatabayyana lakumul-khaiṭul-abyaḍu minal-khaiṭil-aswadi minal-fajr(i), ṡumma atimmuṣ-ṣiyāma ilal-lail(i), wa lā tubāsyirūhunna wa antum ‘ākifūna fil-masājid(i) tilka ḥudūdullāhi falā taqrabūhā, każālika yubayyinullāhu āyātihī lin-nāsi la‘allahum yattaqūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: It has been made permissible for you the night preceding fasting to go to your wives [for sexual relations]. They are a clothing for you and you are a clothing<sup foot_note=195996>1</sup> for them. Allāh knows that you used to deceive yourselves,<sup foot_note=195995>2</sup> so He accepted your repentance and forgave you. So now, have relations with them and seek that which Allāh has decreed for you [i.e., offspring]. And eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct to you from the black thread [of night]. Then complete the fast until the night [i.e., sunset]. And do not have relations with them as long as you are staying for worship in the mosques. These are the limits [set by] Allāh, so do not approach them. Thus does Allāh make clear His verses [i.e., ordinances] to the people that they may become righteous.
ayat.teksInggris: It has been made permissible for you the night preceding fasting to go to your wives [for sexual relations]. They are a clothing for you and you are a clothing<sup foot_note=195996>1</sup> for them. Allāh knows that you used to deceive yourselves,<sup foot_note=195995>2</sup> so He accepted your repentance and forgave you. So now, have relations with them and seek that which Allāh has decreed for you [i.e., offspring]. And eat and drink until the white thread of dawn becomes distinct to you from the black thread [of night]. Then complete the fast until the night [i.e., sunset]. And do not have relations with them as long as you are staying for worship in the mosques. These are the limits [set by] Allāh, so do not approach them. Thus does Allāh make clear His verses [i.e., ordinances] to the people that they may become righteous.

ayat.teksArab: وَلَا تَأْكُلُوْٓا اَمْوَالَكُمْ بَيْنَكُمْ بِالْبَاطِلِ وَتُدْلُوْا بِهَآ اِلَى الْحُكَّامِ لِتَأْكُلُوْا فَرِيْقًا مِّنْ اَمْوَالِ النَّاسِ بِالْاِثْمِ وَاَنْتُمْ تَعْلَمُوْنَ ࣖ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa lā ta'kulū amwālakum bainakum bil-bāṭili wa tudlū bihā ilal-ḥukkāmi lita'kulū farīqam min amwālin-nāsi bil-iṡmi wa antum ta‘lamūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And do not consume one another's wealth unjustly or send it [in bribery] to the rulers in order that [they might aid] you [to] consume a portion of the wealth of the people in sin, while you know [it is unlawful].
ayat.teksInggris: And do not consume one another's wealth unjustly or send it [in bribery] to the rulers in order that [they might aid] you [to] consume a portion of the wealth of the people in sin, while you know [it is unlawful].

ayat.teksArab: ۞ يَسْـَٔلُوْنَكَ عَنِ الْاَهِلَّةِ ۗ قُلْ هِيَ مَوَاقِيْتُ لِلنَّاسِ وَالْحَجِّ ۗ وَلَيْسَ الْبِرُّ بِاَنْ تَأْتُوا الْبُيُوْتَ مِنْ ظُهُوْرِهَا وَلٰكِنَّ الْبِرَّ مَنِ اتَّقٰىۚ وَأْتُوا الْبُيُوْتَ مِنْ اَبْوَابِهَا ۖ وَاتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُوْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Yas'alūnaka ‘anil-ahillah(ti), qul hiya mawāqītu lin-nāsi wal-ḥajj(i), wa laisal-birru  bi'an ta'tul-buyūta  min ẓuhūrihā  wa lākinnal-birra manittaqā, wa'tul-buyūta min abwābihā, wattaqullāha la‘allakum tufliḥūn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: They ask you, [O Muḥammad], about the crescent moons. Say, "They are measurements of time for the people and for ḥajj [pilgrimage]." And it is not righteousness to enter houses from the back, but righteousness is [in] one who fears Allāh. And enter houses from their doors. And fear Allāh that you may succeed.
ayat.teksInggris: They ask you, [O Muḥammad], about the crescent moons. Say, "They are measurements of time for the people and for ḥajj [pilgrimage]." And it is not righteousness to enter houses from the back, but righteousness is [in] one who fears Allāh. And enter houses from their doors. And fear Allāh that you may succeed.

ayat.teksArab: وَقَاتِلُوْا فِيْ سَبِيْلِ اللّٰهِ الَّذِيْنَ يُقَاتِلُوْنَكُمْ وَلَا تَعْتَدُوْا ۗ اِنَّ اللّٰهَ لَا يُحِبُّ الْمُعْتَدِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Wa qātilū fī sabīlillāhil-lażīna yuqātilūnakum wa lā ta‘tadū, innallāha lā yuḥibbul-mu‘tadīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: Fight in the way of Allāh those who fight against you but do not transgress. Indeed, Allāh does not like transgressors.
ayat.teksInggris: Fight in the way of Allāh those who fight against you but do not transgress. Indeed, Allāh does not like transgressors.

ayat.teksArab: وَاقْتُلُوْهُمْ حَيْثُ ثَقِفْتُمُوْهُمْ وَاَخْرِجُوْهُمْ مِّنْ حَيْثُ اَخْرَجُوْكُمْ وَالْفِتْنَةُ اَشَدُّ مِنَ الْقَتْلِ ۚ وَلَا تُقٰتِلُوْهُمْ عِنْدَ الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ حَتّٰى يُقٰتِلُوْكُمْ فِيْهِۚ فَاِنْ قٰتَلُوْكُمْ فَاقْتُلُوْهُمْۗ  كَذٰلِكَ جَزَاۤءُ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
ayat.teksLatin: Waqtulūhum ḥaiṡu ṡaqiftumūhum wa akhrijūhum min ḥaiṡu akhrajūkum wal-fitnatu asyaddu minal-qatl(i), wa lā tuqātilūhum ‘indal-masjidil-ḥarāmi ḥattā yuqātilūkum fīh(i), fa'in qātalūkum faqtulūhum,  każālika jazā'ul-kāfirīn(a).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And kill them [in battle] wherever you overtake them and expel them from wherever they have expelled you, and fitnah<sup foot_note=195997>1</sup> is worse than killing. And do not fight them at al-Masjid al-Ḥarām until they fight you there. But if they fight you, then kill them. Such is the recompense of the disbelievers.
ayat.teksInggris: And kill them [in battle] wherever you overtake them and expel them from wherever they have expelled you, and fitnah<sup foot_note=195997>1</sup> is worse than killing. And do not fight them at al-Masjid al-Ḥarām until they fight you there. But if they fight you, then kill them. Such is the recompense of the disbelievers.

ayat.teksArab: فَاِنِ انْتَهَوْا فَاِنَّ اللّٰهَ غَفُوْرٌ رَّحِيْمٌ
ayat.teksLatin: Fa'inintahau fa'innallāha gafūrur raḥīm(un).
ayat.teksIndonesia: And if they cease, then indeed, Allāh is Forgiving and Merciful.
ayat.teksInggris: And if they cease, then indeed, Allāh is Forgiving and Merciful.

ayat.teksArab: وَقٰتِلُوْهُمْ حَتّٰى لَا تَكُوْنَ فِتْنَةٌ وَّيَكُوْنَ الدِّيْنُ لِلّٰهِ ۗ فَاِنِ انْتَهَوْا فَلَا عُدْوَانَ اِلَّا عَلَى الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
